00034     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00035     // Multipole Interaction Class //
00036     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00037 
00038     class XInteractor
00039     {
00040     public:
00041 
00042         XInteractor(Topology *top, XMP *xm) : _top(top), _xm(xm) {};
00043         XInteractor() : _top(NULL), _xm(NULL) {};
00044        ~XInteractor() {};
00045 
00046         // UNITS IN INPUT FILES
00047         // ... Always use atomic units
00048         // ... ... Positions in a0 (bohr)
00049         // ... ... Multipole moment of rank k in e(a0)**k
00050         // ... ... Dipole polarizability in A³ (Angstrom cubed)
00051 
00052         // UNITS USED INTERNALLY
00053         // ... Use nm instead of a0 and A
00054         // ... ... Positions in nm
00055         // ... ... Multipole moment of rank k in e(nm)**k
00056         // ... ... Dipole polarizability in nm³
00057 
00058         // CONVERSION FACTORS
00059         // ... Electric field (N/C) = Electric field (int)
00060         //                          * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+18
00061         // ... Energy (eV) = Energy (int) * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+09
00062         //
00063         // ... Potential (V) = Potential(int) * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+0.9
00064 
00065 
00066         inline double EnergyInter(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00067         inline double EnergyInterESP(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00068         inline double EnergyIntra(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00069         inline void FieldPerm(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00070         inline vec  FieldPermESF(vec r, PolarSite &pol);
00071         inline void FieldIndu(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00072         inline void FieldInduAlpha(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00073 
00074         inline double PotentialPerm(vec r, PolarSite &pol);
00075 
00076         void ResetEnergy() { EP = EU_INTER = EU_INTRA = 0.0; }
00077         double &getEP() { return EP; }
00078         double &getEU_INTER() { return EU_INTER; }
00079         double &getEU_INTRA() { return EU_INTRA; }
00080 
00081     private:
00082 
00083         double EP;       //   <- Interaction permanent multipoles (inter-site)
00084         double EU_INTRA; //   <- Interaction induction multipoles (intra-site)
00085         double EU_INTER; //   <- Interaction induction multipoles (inter-site)

00088         vec    e12;     //  |
00089         double u3;      //  |-> NOTE: Only needed when using Thole model
00090         double a;       //  |         (do not forget to init. though...)
00091 
00092         double R;       //  |
00093         double R2;      //  |
00094         double R3;      //  |-> NOTE: reciprocal, i.e. e.g. R3 = 1/(R*R*R)
00095         double R4;      //  |
00096         double R5;      //  |
00097

00099         double rbx, rby, rbz;
00100         double cxx, cxy, cxz;
00101         double cyx, cyy, cyz;
00102         double czx, czy, czz;
00103 
00104         inline double lambda3() { return 1 - exp( -a*u3); }
00105         inline double lambda5() { return 1 - (1 + a*u3) * exp( -a*u3); }
00106         inline double lambda7() { return 1 - (1 + a*u3 + 0.6*a*a*u3*u3) * exp( -a*u3); }
00107         inline double lambda9() { return 1 - (1 + a*u3 + (18*a*a*u3*u3 + 9*a*a*a*u3*u3*u3)/35) * exp( -a*u3); }

00240         inline double T21s_21c() { return R5 * (35*rbx*rbz*ray*raz + 5*rbx*ray*czz + 5*rbx*raz*cyz + 5*rbz*ray*czx + 5*rbz*raz*cyx + cyx*czz + czx*cyz); }
00241         inline double T22c_21c() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rbx*rbz*rax*rax - 35*rbx*rbz*ray*ray + 10*rbx*rax*cxz - 10*rbx*ray*cyz + 10*rbz*rax*cxx - 10*rbz*ray*cyx + 2*cxx*cxz - 2*cyx*cyz); }
00242         inline double T22s_21c() { return R5 * (35*rbx*rbz*rax*ray + 5*rbx*rax*cyz + 5*rbx*ray*cxz + 5*rbz*rax*cyx + 5*rbz*ray*cxx + cxx*cyz + cyx*cxz); }
00243         inline double T22c_21s() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rby*rbz*rax*rax - 35*rby*rbz*ray*ray + 10*rby*rax*cxz - 10*rby*ray*cyz + 10*rbz*rax*cxy - 10*rbz*ray*cyy + 2*cxy*cxz - 2*cyy*cyz); }
00244         inline double T22s_21s() { return R5 * (35*rby*rbz*rax*ray + 5*rby*rax*cyz + 5*rby*ray*cxz + 5*rbz*rax*cyy + 5*rbz*ray*cxy + cxy*cyz + cyy*cxz); }
00245         inline double T22s_22c() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rbx*rbx*rax*ray - 35*rby*rby*rax*ray + 10*rbx*rax*cyx + 10*rbx*ray*cxx - 10*rby*rax*cyy - 10*rby*ray*cxy + 2*cxx*cyx - 2*cxy*cyy); }
00246 
00247         Topology        *_top;
00248         XMP             *_xm;
00249 
00250     };
00251 
00252     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00253     // XJob (distr. among threads) //
00254     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00255 
00256     class XJob
00257     {
00258     public:
00259 
00260         XJob(int id,     string tag, int pairId,
00261              int seg1Id, int seg2Id, string mps1,
00262              string mps2, Topology *top) :
00263 
00264              _id(id),         _tag(tag),       _pairId(pairId),
00265              _seg1Id(seg1Id), _seg2Id(seg2Id), _mps1(mps1),
00266              _mps2(mps2),     _start_from_cpt(false) {
00267 
00268              _seg1 = top->getSegment(seg1Id);
00269              _seg2 = top->getSegment(seg2Id);
00270              _pair = top->NBList().FindPair(_seg1,_seg2);
00271 
00272              if (_pair == NULL) {
00273                 cout << endl
00274                      << "ERROR: No such pair " << pairId
00275                      << "(SEG1 " << seg1Id << ", SEG2 " << seg2Id << "). "
00276                      << flush;
00277                 throw runtime_error("Pair specs do not match topology.");
00278              }
00279              assert ( pairId == _pair->getId() );
00280 
00281              // Watch out for periodic-boundary correction
00282              _center = ( _pair->Seg1PbCopy()->Atoms().size()
00283                        * _pair->Seg1PbCopy()->getPos()
00284 
00285                        + _pair->Seg2PbCopy()->Atoms().size()
00286                        * _pair->Seg2PbCopy()->getPos() )
00287 
00288                        / (_pair->Seg1PbCopy()->Atoms().size()
00289                        +  _pair->Seg2PbCopy()->Atoms().size() );
00290        }
00291 
00292        ~XJob() {};
00293 
00294        int      getId()                     { return _id; }
00295        string   getTag()                    { return _tag; }
00296        int      getPairId()                 { return _pairId; }
00297        int      getSeg1Id()                 { return _seg1Id; }
00298        int      getSeg2Id()                 { return _seg2Id; }
00299        string   getMPS1()                   { return _mps1; }
00300        string   getMPS2()                   { return _mps2; }
00301 
00302        void     setIter(int iter)           { _iter = iter; }
00303        void     setSizePol(int size)        { _sizePol = size; }
00304        void     setSizeShell(int size)      { _sizeShell = size; }
00305        void     setEnergy(double energy)    { _energy = energy; }
00306 
00307        void     WriteInfoLine(FILE *out) {
00308 
00309            fprintf(out, "%5d %-20s  ENER %+4.7f ITER %3d SPHERE %4d SHELL %4d"
00310                         " CENTER %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f \n",
00311                         _id, _tag.c_str(), _energy, _iter, _sizePol, _sizeShell,
00312                         _center.getX(), _center.getY(), _center.getZ() );
00313        }
00314 
00315        bool     StartFromCPT()  { return _start_from_cpt; }
00316 
00317        Segment *Seg1()          { return _seg1; }
00318        Segment *Seg2()          { return _seg2; }
00319        QMPair  *Pair()          { return _pair; }
00320        vec     &Center()        { return _center; }
00321 
00322     private:
00323 
00324        int          _id;
00325        string       _tag;
00326        int          _pairId;
00327        int          _seg1Id;
00328        int          _seg2Id;
00329        string       _mps1;
00330        string       _mps2;
00331 
00332        bool         _start_from_cpt;
00333 
00334        QMPair      *_pair;
00335        Segment     *_seg1;
00336        Segment     *_seg2;
00337        vec          _center;
00338 
00339 
00340        int          _iter;
00341        int          _sizePol;
00342        int          _sizeShell;
00343        double       _energy;
00344 
00345     };
00346 
00347     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00348     // Job Operator (Thread class) //
00349     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00350 
00351     class JobXMP : public Thread
00352     {
00353     public:
00354 
00355         JobXMP(int id,     Topology *top,        XMP *master)
00356                 : _id(id),          _top(top),       _master(master)
00357                    { _actor = XInteractor(top,_master); };
00358 
00359        ~JobXMP() {};
00360 
00361         int         getId() { return _id; }
00362         void        setId(int id) { _id = id; }
00363 
00364         void        InitSlotData(Topology *top);
00365         void        Run(void);
00366         void        EvalJob(Topology *top, XJob *job);
00367 
00368         int         Induce(int state, XJob *job);
00369         double      Energy(int state, XJob *job);
00370         double      EnergyStatic(int state, XJob *job);
00371 
00372         
00373 
00374 
00375 
00376     public:
00377 
00378         int                           _id;
00379         Topology                     *_top;
00380         XMP                          *_master;
00381         XJob                         *_job;
00382 
00383         vector< Segment* >           _segsPolSphere;  // Segments    in c/o 0-1
00384         vector< Segment* >           _segsOutSphere;  // Segments    in c/0 1-2
00385         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > _polsPolSphere;  // Polar sites in c/o 0-1
00386         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > _polsOutSphere;  // Polar sites in c/o 1-2
00387         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > _polarSites;     // Copy of top polar sites
00388         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > _polarSites_job; // Adapted to job specs
00389         XInteractor                  _actor;
00390     };
00391 
00392     XJob               *RequestNextJob(int id, Topology *top);
00393     void                LockCout() { _coutMutex.Lock(); }
00394     void                UnlockCout() { _coutMutex.Unlock(); }
00395 
00396 private:
00397 
00398     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00399     // MULTIPOLE ALLOCATION TO SEGMENTS / PAIRS //
00400     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00401 
00402     string                         _job_file;
00403     string                         _emp_file;
00404     string                         _xml_file;
00405 
00406     // Job info : JOB_ID PAIR_ID MPS_1 MPS_2 TAG
00407     vector<XJob*>                  _XJobs;
00408     vector<XJob*>::iterator        _nextXJob;
00409     Mutex                          _nextJobMutex;
00410     Mutex                          _coutMutex;
00411     Mutex                          _logMutex;
00412     bool                           _maverick;
00413 
00414     vector<int>                    _jobIds;
00415     map<int,string>                _jobId_jobTag;
00416     map<int,int>                   _jobId_pairId;
00417     map<int,string>                _jobId_mpsFile1;
00418     map<int,string>                _jobId_mpsFile2;
00419     map<int, pair<int,int> >       _pairId_seg1Id_seg2Id;
00420     vector<int>::iterator          _nextJob;
00421 
00422     // Allocate .mps files to segments (n 0, e -1, h +1)
00423     map<int,string>                 _segId_mpsFile_n;
00424     map<int,string>                 _segId_mpsFile_e;
00425     map<int,string>                 _segId_mpsFile_h;
00426 
00427     // Store polar site containers, one for each .mps file
00428     map<string,vector<PolarSite*> > _mpsFile_pSites;
00429     map<string,vector<PolarSite*> > _mpsFile_pSites_job;
00430 
00431     // Allocate polar sites to fragments in segments
00432     map<string, bool>               _map2md;
00433     map<string, vector<int> >       _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00434     map<string, vector<string> >    _alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00435     map<string, vector<int> >       _alloc_frag_trihedron;
00436     map<string, vector<double> >    _alloc_frag_weights;
00437 
00438     string                          _pdb_check;
00439     bool                            _write_chk;
00440     string                          _write_chk_suffix;
00441     bool                            _chk_split_dpl;
00442     double                          _chk_dpl_spacing;
00443     string                          _chk_format;
00444 
00445 
00446     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00447     // INDUCTION + ENERGY EVALUATION            //
00448     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00449 
00450     // Control options
00451     bool                            _induce;
00452 
00453     // Interaction parameters
00454     bool                            _useCutoff;
00455     double                          _cutoff;
00456     double                          _cutoff2;
00457     bool                            _useExp;
00458     double                          _aDamp;
00459     bool                            _useScaling;
00460     vector<double>                  _scale1;
00461 
00462     // Convergence parameters
00463     float                           _wSOR_N;
00464     float                           _wSOR_C;
00465     double                          _epsTol;
00466     int                             _maxIter;
00467 
00468     // Logging
00469     string                          _outFile;
00470     bool                            _energies2File;
00471     map<int,vector<int> >           _log_seg_iter;
00472     map<int,int>                    _log_seg_sphereSize;
00473     map<int,vec>                    _log_seg_com;
00474 
00475 
00476 };

00482 
00483 void XMP::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *opt) {
00484 
00485     cout << endl
00486          << "... ... Initialized with " << _nThreads << " threads. "
00487          << flush;
00488 
00489     _maverick = (_nThreads == 1) ? true : false;
00490     
00491 
00492     string key = "options.xmultipole.multipoles";
00493 
00494         if ( opt->exists(key) ) {
00495             _xml_file = opt->get(key).as< string >();
00496         }
00497 
00498     key = "options.xmultipole.control";
00499 
00500         if ( opt->exists(key+".job_file")) {
00501             _job_file   = opt->get(key+".job_file").as<string>();
00502         }
00503         else {
00504             _job_file   = opt->get(key+".job_file").as<string>();
00505         }
00506 
00507         if ( opt->exists(key+".emp_file")) {
00508             _emp_file   = opt->get(key+".emp_file").as<string>();
00509         }
00510         else {
00511             _emp_file   = opt->get(key+".emp_file").as<string>();
00512         }
00513 
00514         if ( opt->exists(key+".output") ) {
00515             _outFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
00516             _energies2File = true;
00517         }
00518         else { _energies2File = false; }
00519 
00520         if (opt->exists(key+".pdb_check")) {
00521             _pdb_check = opt->get(key+".pdb_check").as<string>();
00522         }
00523         else { _pdb_check = ""; }
00524 
00525         if (opt->exists(key+".write_chk")) {
00526             _write_chk_suffix = opt->get(key+".write_chk").as<string>();
00527             _write_chk = true;
00528         }
00529         else { _write_chk = false; }
00530 
00531         if (opt->exists(key+".format_chk")) {
00532             _chk_format = opt->get(key+".format_chk").as<string>();
00533         }
00534         else { _chk_format = "xyz"; }
00535 
00536         if (opt->exists(key+".split_dpl")) {
00537             _chk_split_dpl = (opt->get(key+".split_dpl").as<int>() == 1) ?
00538                          true : false;
00539         }
00540         else { _chk_split_dpl = true; }
00541 
00542         if (opt->exists(key+".dpl_spacing")) {
00543             _chk_dpl_spacing = opt->get(key+".dpl_spacing").as<double>();
00544         }
00545         else {
00546             _chk_dpl_spacing = 1.0e-6;
00547         }
00548 
00549 
00550     key = "options.xmultipole.tholemodel";
00551 
00552         if ( opt->exists(key+".induce") ) {
00553             int induce = opt->get(key+".induce").as< int >();
00554             _induce = (induce == 0) ? false : true;
00555         }
00556         else { _induce = true; }
00557 
00558         if ( opt->exists(key+".cutoff1") ) {
00559             _cutoff = opt->get(key+".cutoff1").as< double >();
00560             if (_cutoff) { _useCutoff = true; }
00561         }
00562         if ( opt->exists(key+".cutoff2") ) {
00563             _cutoff2 = opt->get(key+".cutoff2").as< double >();
00564         }
00565         else {
00566             _cutoff2 = _cutoff;
00567         }
00568         if ( opt->exists(key+".exp_damp") ) {
00569             _aDamp = opt->get(key+".exp_damp").as< double >();
00570             if (_aDamp) { _useExp = true; }
00571         }
00572         if ( opt->exists(key+".scaling") ) {
00573             _scale1 = opt->get(key+".scaling").as< vector<double> >();
00574             if (0 < _scale1.size() && _scale1.size() < 4) {
00575                 _useScaling = true; }
00576             else {
00577                 _useScaling = false;
00578                 cout << endl << "... ... WARNING: 1-N SCALING SWITCHED OFF"; }
00579         }
00580 
00581     key = "options.xmultipole.convergence";
00582 
00583         if ( opt->exists(key+".wSOR_N") ) {
00584             _wSOR_N = opt->get(key+".wSOR_N").as< float >();
00585         }
00586         else { _wSOR_N = 0.75; }
00587         if ( opt->exists(key+".wSOR_C") ) {
00588             _wSOR_C = opt->get(key+".wSOR_C").as< float >();
00589         }
00590         else { _wSOR_C = 0.75; }
00591 
00592         if ( opt->exists(key+".max_iter") ) {
00593             _maxIter = opt->get(key+".max_iter").as< int >();
00594         }
00595         else { _maxIter = 512; }
00596 
00597         if ( opt->exists(key+".tolerance") ) {
00598             _epsTol = opt->get(key+".tolerance").as< double >();
00599         }
00600         else { _epsTol = 0.001; }    
00601 
00602 }
00603 
00604 
00605 void XMP::Collect_XML(string xml_file, Topology *top) {
00606 
00607     cout << endl 
00608          << "... ... ... Allocate polar sites to fragments. "
00609          << flush;
00610 
00611     string allocFile = xml_file;
00612 
00613     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00614     // Load polar-site indices from XML //
00615     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00616 
00617     // => Output to maps:
00618     map<string, vector<int> > alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00619     map<string, vector<string> > alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00620     map<string, vector<int> > alloc_frag_trihedron;
00621     map<string, vector<double> > alloc_frag_weights;
00622 
00623     Property allocation; // <- Which polar sites are part of which fragment?
00624     load_property_from_xml(allocation, allocFile.c_str());
00625 
00626 
00627     /* --- MULTIPOLES.XML Structure ---
00628      *
00629      * <topology>
00630      *
00631      *     <molecules>
00632      *          <molecule>
00633      *          <name></name>
00634      *
00635      *          <segments>
00636      *
00637      *              <segment>
00638      *              <name>DCV</name>
00639      *
00640      *              <map2md></map2md>
00641      *
00642      *              <fragments>
00643      *                  <fragment>
00644      *                  <name></name>
00645      *                  <mpoles></mpoles>
00646      *                  </fragment>
00647      *              </fragments>
00648      *              ...
00649      *              ...
00650      */
00651 
00652 
00653     string key = "topology.molecules.molecule";
00654     list<Property *> mols = allocation.Select(key);
00655     list<Property *>::iterator molit;
00656     for (molit = mols.begin(); molit != mols.end(); molit++) {
00657 
00658         string molName = (*molit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00659 
00660         key = "segments.segment";
00661         list<Property *> segs = (*molit)->Select(key);
00662         list<Property *>::iterator segit;
00663 
00664         for (segit = segs.begin(); segit != segs.end(); segit++) {
00665 
00666             string segName = (*segit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00667 
00668             // Default: Project multipoles onto rigidified coordinates
00669             if ( (*segit)->exists("map2md")) {
00670                 int map2md = (*segit)->get("map2md").as<int>();
00671                 _map2md[segName] = (map2md == 0) ? false : true;
00672             }
00673             else {
00674                 _map2md[segName] = false; // i.e. map to rigidified coordinates
00675             }
00676 
00677             key = "fragments.fragment";
00678             list<Property *> frags = (*segit)->Select(key);
00679             list<Property *>::iterator fragit;
00680 
00681             for (fragit = frags.begin(); fragit != frags.end(); fragit++) {
00682 
00683                 string fragName = (*fragit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00684                 string mapKeyName = fragName + segName + molName;
00685 
00686                 string mpoles = (*fragit)->get("mpoles").as<string> ();
00687 
00688                 vector<int> trihedron = (*fragit)->get("localframe")
00689                                                 .as< vector<int> >();
00690 
00691                 vector<double> weights = (*fragit)->get("weights")
00692                                                 .as< vector<double> >();
00693 
00694                 Tokenizer tokPoles(mpoles, " \t\n");
00695                 vector<string> mpoleInfo;
00696                 tokPoles.ToVector(mpoleInfo);
00697 
00698                 vector<int> mpoleIdcs;
00699                 vector<string> mpoleNames;
00700 
00701                 vector<string> ::iterator strit;
00702                 for (strit=mpoleInfo.begin(); strit<mpoleInfo.end(); strit++) {
00703 
00704                     Tokenizer tokPoleInfo( (*strit), " :");
00705                     vector<string> poleInfo;
00706                     tokPoleInfo.ToVector(poleInfo);
00707 
00708                     int mpoleIdx = boost::lexical_cast<int>(poleInfo[0]);
00709                     string mpoleName = poleInfo[1];
00710 
00711                     mpoleIdcs.push_back(mpoleIdx);
00712                     mpoleNames.push_back(mpoleName);
00713 
00714                 }
00715 
00716                 alloc_frag_mpoleIdx[mapKeyName] = mpoleIdcs;
00717                 alloc_frag_mpoleName[mapKeyName] = mpoleNames;
00718                 alloc_frag_trihedron[mapKeyName] = trihedron;
00719                 alloc_frag_weights[mapKeyName] = weights;
00720             }
00721         }
00722     }
00723 
00724     _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx    = alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00725     _alloc_frag_mpoleName   = alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00726     _alloc_frag_trihedron   = alloc_frag_trihedron;
00727     _alloc_frag_weights     = alloc_frag_weights;
00728 }
00729 
00730 
00731 void XMP::Collect_JOB(string job_file, Topology *top) {
00732 
00733     QMNBList &nblist = top->NBList();
00734 
00735     std::string line;
00736     std::ifstream intt;
00737     intt.open(job_file.c_str());
00738 
00739     if (intt.is_open() ) {
00740         while ( intt.good() ) {
00741 
00742             std::getline(intt, line);
00743             vector<string> split;
00744             Tokenizer toker(line, " ");
00745             toker.ToVector(split);
00746 
00747             if ( !split.size()      ||
00748                   split[0] == "#"   ||
00749                   split[0].substr(0,1) == "#" ) { continue; }
00750 
00751 // Sample line
00752 // # JOB_ID TAG  PAIR_ID SEG1_ID SEG1_NAME SEG1_MPS SEG2_ID SEG2_NAME SEG2_MPS
00753 //   1      E_CT 3819    182     C60       c60.mps  392     DCV       dcv.mps
00754 
00755             int jobId       = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[0]);
00756             string tag      = split[1];
00757             int pairId      = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[2]);
00758 
00759             int seg1Id      = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[3]);
00760             string seg1Name = split[4];
00761             string seg1mps  = split[5];
00762 
00763             int seg2Id      = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[6]);
00764             string seg2Name = split[7];
00765             string seg2mps  = split[8];
00766 
00767             Segment *seg1   = top->getSegment(seg1Id);
00768             Segment *seg2   = top->getSegment(seg2Id);
00769             QMPair  *qmp    = nblist.FindPair(seg1,seg2);
00770 
00771             _XJobs.push_back(new XJob(jobId,  tag,     pairId,
00772                                       seg1Id, seg2Id, seg1mps, 
00773                                       seg2mps, top));
00774 
00775         } /* Exit loop over lines */
00776     }
00777     else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << job_file << endl;
00778            throw runtime_error("Please supply input file.");           }
00779 
00780     cout << endl 
00781          << "... ... ... Registered " << _XJobs.size() << " jobs. "
00782          << flush;
00783 
00784 }
00785 
00786 
00787 void XMP::Collect_MPS(Topology *top) {
00788 
00789     // +++++++++++++ //
00790     // Parse + Store //
00791     // +++++++++++++ //
00792 
00793     map<int,string> ::iterator misit;
00794 
00795     // Neutral species
00796     for (misit = _segId_mpsFile_n.begin();
00797          misit != _segId_mpsFile_n.end();
00798          ++misit) {
00799         if (_mpsFile_pSites.count(misit->second) > 0 ) { continue; }
00800         else { _mpsFile_pSites[misit->second] = Parse_GDMA(misit->second, 0); }
00801     }
00802 
00803     // Anion
00804     for (misit = _segId_mpsFile_e.begin();
00805          misit != _segId_mpsFile_e.end();
00806          ++misit) {
00807         if (_mpsFile_pSites.count(misit->second) > 0 ) { continue; }
00808         else { _mpsFile_pSites[misit->second] = Parse_GDMA(misit->second, -1); }
00809     }
00810 
00811     // Cation
00812     for (misit = _segId_mpsFile_h.begin();
00813          misit != _segId_mpsFile_h.end();
00814          ++misit) {
00815         if (_mpsFile_pSites.count(misit->second) > 0 ) { continue; }
00816         else { _mpsFile_pSites[misit->second] = Parse_GDMA(misit->second, +1); }
00817     }
00818 
00819 
00820     // Job Seg1 Seg2
00821     vector<XJob*> :: iterator jit;
00822     for (jit = _XJobs.begin();
00823          jit < _XJobs.end();
00824          ++jit) {
00825 
00826         string mpsfile1 = (*jit)->getMPS1();
00827         string mpsfile2 = (*jit)->getMPS2();
00828 
00829         if (_mpsFile_pSites_job.count(mpsfile1) > 0 ) { ; }
00830         else { _mpsFile_pSites_job[mpsfile1] = Parse_GDMA(mpsfile1, 0); }
00831 
00832         if (_mpsFile_pSites_job.count(mpsfile2) > 0 ) { ; }
00833         else { _mpsFile_pSites_job[mpsfile2] = Parse_GDMA(mpsfile2, 0); }
00834 
00835     }
00836 
00837 //    map<string, vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator it;
00838 //    for (it = _mpsFile_pSites_job.begin();
00839 //         it != _mpsFile_pSites_job.end();
00840 //         ++it) {
00841 //         cout << endl << "KEY_" << it->first << flush;
00842 //    }
00843 
00844 
00845     cout << endl
00846          << "... ... ... Parsed " << _mpsFile_pSites.size()
00847          << " .mps files from " << _emp_file
00848          << ", " << _mpsFile_pSites_job.size()
00849          << " .mps files from " << _job_file
00850          << flush;
00851 }
00852 
00853 
00854 void XMP::Collect_EMP(string emp_file, Topology *top) {
00855 
00856     std::string line;
00857     std::ifstream intt;
00858     intt.open(emp_file.c_str());
00859 
00860     if (intt.is_open() ) {
00861         while ( intt.good() ) {
00862 
00863             std::getline(intt, line);
00864             vector<string> split;
00865             Tokenizer toker(line, " ");
00866             toker.ToVector(split);
00867 
00868             if ( !split.size()      ||
00869                   split[0] == "#"   ||
00870                   split[0].substr(0,1) == "#" ) { continue; }
00871 
00872             // Line sample:
00873             // 1022 C60 C60_n.mps C60_e.mps C60_h.mps
00874 
00875             int segId       = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[0]);
00876             string segName  = boost::lexical_cast<string>(split[1]);
00877 
00878             // Some compliance checks
00879             assert( split.size() == 5 );                                        // <- File format correct?
00880             assert( top->getSegment(segId)->getName() == segName );             // <- Input matches topology?
00881 
00882             _segId_mpsFile_n[segId] = split[2];
00883             _segId_mpsFile_e[segId] = split[3];
00884             _segId_mpsFile_h[segId] = split[4];
00885 
00886         } // Exit loop over lines
00887     }
00888     else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << emp_file << endl; }
00889 
00890     assert( _segId_mpsFile_n.size() == top->Segments().size() );                // <- Input for all segments?
00891 
00892 }
00893 
00894 
00895 void XMP::Create_MPOLS(Topology *top) {
00896 
00897     bool print_huge_map2md_warning = false;
00898 
00899     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00900     // Equip TOP with distributed multipoles //
00901     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00902 
00903     vector<Segment*> ::iterator sit;
00904     for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
00905          sit < top->Segments().end();
00906          ++sit) {
00907 
00908         Segment *seg                = *sit;
00909         int segId                   = seg->getId();
00910 
00911         bool map2md                 = _map2md[seg->getName()];
00912 
00913         string mps_n                = _segId_mpsFile_n[segId];
00914         string mps_h                = _segId_mpsFile_h[segId];
00915         string mps_e                = _segId_mpsFile_e[segId];
00916 
00917         vector<PolarSite*> pols_n   = _mpsFile_pSites[mps_n];
00918         vector<PolarSite*> pols_h   = _mpsFile_pSites[mps_h];
00919         vector<PolarSite*> pols_e   = _mpsFile_pSites[mps_e];
00920 
00921         // Merge polar sites
00922         assert(pols_n.size() == pols_h.size());
00923         assert(pols_n.size() == pols_e.size());
00924 
00925         for (int i = 0; i < pols_n.size(); i++) {
00926             pols_n[i]->setQs( pols_h[i]->getQs(+1), +1 );
00927             pols_n[i]->setPs( pols_h[i]->getPs(+1), +1 );
00928         }
00929         for (int i = 0; i < pols_n.size(); ++i) {
00930             pols_n[i]->setQs(pols_e[i]->getQs(-1), -1 );
00931             pols_n[i]->setPs(pols_e[i]->getPs(-1), -1 );
00932         }
00933 
00934         vector<Fragment*> ::iterator fit;
00935         for (fit = seg->Fragments().begin();
00936              fit < seg->Fragments().end();
00937              ++fit) {
00938 
00939             Fragment *frag = *fit;
00940 
00941             // Retrieve polar-site data for this fragment
00942             string idkey                = frag->getName() + seg->getName()
00943                                         + seg->getMolecule()->getName();
00944             vector<int> polesInFrag     = _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx.at(idkey);
00945             vector<string> namesInFrag  = _alloc_frag_mpoleName.at(idkey);
00946             vector<double> weightsInFrag= _alloc_frag_weights.at(idkey);
00947 
00948             if (map2md && polesInFrag.size() != frag->Atoms().size()) {
00949                 cout << endl
00950                      << "ERROR: Segment " << seg->getName()
00951                      << " Fragment " << frag->getName()
00952                      << ": MAP2MD = TRUE requires same number of polar "
00953                      << "sites as there are atoms to perform mapping. "
00954                      << endl;
00955                 throw runtime_error("Check mapping or switch to map2md = 0");
00956             }
00957 
00958             matrix rotateMP2MD;
00959             vec translateMP2MD;
00960 
00961             // Determine transformation matrices to execute mapping
00962             if (!map2md) {
00963 
00964                 vector<PolarSite*> trihedron_pol;
00965                 vector<Atom*>      trihedron_atm;
00966 
00967                 vector<int> trihedron_ints  = _alloc_frag_trihedron.at(idkey);
00968                 vector<int> ::iterator iit;
00969                 for (iit = trihedron_ints.begin();
00970                      iit < trihedron_ints.end();
00971                      ++iit) {
00972                     trihedron_pol.push_back(pols_n[(*iit)-1]);
00973 
00974                     // Find fragment-internal position = id of leg
00975                     for (int i = 0; i < polesInFrag.size(); ++i) {
00976                         if (polesInFrag[i] == (*iit)) {
00977                             trihedron_atm.push_back(frag->Atoms()[i]);                            
00978                         }
00979                     }
00980                 }
00981 
00982 
00983                 int symmetry = trihedron_pol.size();
00984                 assert (trihedron_pol.size() == trihedron_atm.size() );                
00985 
00986                 vec xMD, yMD, zMD;
00987                 vec xQM, yQM, zQM;
00988 
00989                 if (symmetry == 3) {
00990                     vec r1MD = trihedron_atm[0]->getPos();
00991                     vec r2MD = trihedron_atm[1]->getPos();
00992                     vec r3MD = trihedron_atm[2]->getPos();
00993                     vec r1QM = trihedron_pol[0]->getPos();
00994                     vec r2QM = trihedron_pol[1]->getPos();
00995                     vec r3QM = trihedron_pol[2]->getPos();
00996 
00997                     xMD = r2MD - r1MD;
00998                     yMD = r3MD - r1MD;
00999                     xQM = r2QM - r1QM;
01000                     yQM = r3QM - r1QM;
01001 
01002                     zMD = xMD ^ yMD;
01003                     zQM = xQM ^ yQM;
01004 
01005                     yMD = zMD ^ xMD;
01006                     yQM = zQM ^ xQM;
01007 
01008                     xMD = xMD.normalize();
01009                     yMD = yMD.normalize();
01010                     zMD = zMD.normalize();
01011                     xQM = xQM.normalize();
01012                     yQM = yQM.normalize();
01013                     zQM = zQM.normalize();
01014                 }
01015 
01016                 else if (symmetry = 2) {
01017 
01018                     vec r1MD = trihedron_atm[0]->getPos();
01019                     vec r2MD = trihedron_atm[1]->getPos();
01020                     vec r1QM = trihedron_pol[0]->getPos();
01021                     vec r2QM = trihedron_pol[1]->getPos();
01022 
01023                     xMD = r2MD - r1MD;
01024                     xQM = r2QM - r1QM;
01025 
01026                     // Normalising not necessary, but recommendable, when doing...
01027                     xMD = xMD.normalize();
01028                     xQM = xQM.normalize();
01029 
01030                     vec yMDtmp = vec(0,0,0);
01031                     vec yQMtmp = vec(0,0,0);
01032 
01033     // ... this: Check whether one of the components is equal or close to
01034     // zero. If so, this easily gives a second leg for the trihedron.
01035     if      ( xMD.getX()*xMD.getX() < 1e-6 ) { yMDtmp = vec(1,0,0); }
01036     else if ( xMD.getY()*xMD.getY() < 1e-6 ) { yMDtmp = vec(0,1,0); }
01037     else if ( xMD.getZ()*xMD.getZ() < 1e-6 ) { yMDtmp = vec(0,0,1); }
01038     if      ( xQM.getX()*xQM.getX() < 1e-6 ) { yQMtmp = vec(1,0,0); }
01039     else if ( xQM.getY()*xQM.getY() < 1e-6 ) { yQMtmp = vec(0,1,0); }
01040     else if ( xQM.getZ()*xQM.getZ() < 1e-6 ) { yQMtmp = vec(0,0,1); }
01041 
01042     if ( abs(yMDtmp) < 0.5 ) {
01043        // All components of xMD are unequal to zero => division is safe.
01044        // Choose vector from plane with xMD * inPlaneVec = 0:
01045        double tmp_x = 1.;
01046        double tmp_y = 1.;
01047        double tmp_z = 1/xMD.getZ() * (-xMD.getX()*tmp_x - xMD.getY()*tmp_y);
01048        yMDtmp = vec(tmp_x, tmp_y, tmp_z);
01049        yMDtmp.normalize();
01050     }
01051     if ( abs(yQMtmp) < 0.5 ) {
01052        double tmp_x = 1.;
01053        double tmp_y = 1.;
01054        double tmp_z = 1/xQM.getZ() * (-xQM.getX()*tmp_x - xQM.getY()*tmp_y);
01055        yQMtmp = vec(tmp_x, tmp_y, tmp_z);
01056        yQMtmp.normalize();
01057     }
01058 
01059                     // Now proceed as for symmetry 3
01060                     zMD = xMD ^ yMDtmp;
01061                     yMD = zMD ^ xMD;
01062                     zQM = xQM ^ yQMtmp;
01063                     yQM = zQM ^ xQM;
01064 
01065                     xMD.normalize();
01066                     yMD.normalize();
01067                     zMD.normalize();
01068                     xQM.normalize();
01069                     yQM.normalize();
01070                     zQM.normalize();
01071                 }
01072 
01073                 else if (symmetry = 1) {
01074 
01075                     cout << endl
01076                          << "WARNING: Symmetry = 1 for fragment "
01077                          << frag->getName() << ": This will generate artifacts "
01078                          << "when mapping higher-rank multipoles (dipoles, ..)."
01079                          << endl;
01080 
01081                     xMD = vec(1,0,0);
01082                     yMD = vec(0,1,0);
01083                     zMD = vec(0,0,1);
01084                     xQM = vec(1,0,0);
01085                     yQM = vec(0,1,0);
01086                     zQM = vec(0,0,1);
01087                 }
01088 
01089                 else {
01090                     cout << endl
01091                          << "NOTE: Invalid definition of local frame in fragment "
01092                          << frag->getName();
01093                     cout << ". Assuming point particle for mapping. "
01094                          << endl;
01095                     cout << endl
01096                          << "WARNING: Symmetry = 1 for fragment "
01097                          << frag->getName() << ": This will generate artifacts "
01098                          << "when mapping higher-rank multipoles (dipoles, ..)."
01099                          << endl;
01100 
01101                     xMD = vec(1,0,0);
01102                     yMD = vec(0,1,0);
01103                     zMD = vec(0,0,1);
01104                     xQM = vec(1,0,0);
01105                     yQM = vec(0,1,0);
01106                     zQM = vec(0,0,1);
01107                 }
01108 
01109                 matrix rotMD = matrix(xMD, yMD, zMD);
01110                 matrix rotMP = matrix(xQM, yQM, zQM);
01111                 
01112                 rotateMP2MD = rotMD * rotMP.Transpose();
01113 
01114 
01115                 // ++++++++++++++++++ //
01116                 // Transform fragment //
01117                 // ++++++++++++++++++ //
01118 
01119                 
01120                 vec CoMP = vec(0.,0.,0.);
01121                 double W = 0.0;
01122                 for (int i = 0; i < polesInFrag.size(); ++i) {
01123 
01124                     double weight = weightsInFrag[i];
01125                     
01126                     vec pos = pols_n[polesInFrag[i]-1]->getPos();
01127                     
01128                     CoMP += weight*pos;
01129                     W += weight;
01130 
01131                 }
01132                 CoMP /= W;
01133 
01134                 translateMP2MD = frag->getCoMD() - CoMP;
01135 
01136             }            
01137 
01138             // Create polar sites 
01139             for (int i = 0; i < polesInFrag.size(); i++) {
01140 
01141                 string name             = namesInFrag[i];
01142                 int poleId              = polesInFrag[i];
01143 
01144                 PolarSite *templ        = pols_n[poleId-1];
01145                 PolarSite *newSite      = top->AddPolarSite(name);
01146                 newSite->ImportFrom(templ);
01147                 seg->AddPolarSite(newSite);
01148                 frag->AddPolarSite(newSite);
01149 
01150                 // Shift + rotate
01151                 if (!map2md) {
01152                     newSite->Translate(translateMP2MD);
01153                     newSite->Rotate(rotateMP2MD, frag->getCoMD());
01154                 }
01155                 else {
01156                     vec mdpos = frag->Atoms()[i]->getPos();
01157                     newSite->setPos(mdpos);
01158                     if (newSite->getRank() > 0) {
01159                         print_huge_map2md_warning = true;
01160                     }
01161                 }
01162             }
01163         }
01164     }
01165 
01166     if (print_huge_map2md_warning) {
01167         cout << endl << endl
01168              << "**************************************************************"
01169              << "WARNING: MAP2MD = TRUE while using higher-rank multipoles can "
01170              << "mess up the orientation of those multipoles if the coordinate "
01171              << "frame used in the .mps file does not agree with the global MD "
01172              << "frame. If you know what you are doing - proceed ... "
01173              << "**************************************************************"
01174              << endl;
01175     }
01176 
01177     top->setIsEStatified(true);
01178 
01179 }
01180 
01181 
01182 vector<PolarSite*> XMP::Map_MPols_To_Seg(vector<PolarSite*> &pols_n, Segment *seg) {
01183 
01184     bool print_huge_map2md_warning = false;
01185 
01186     vector<PolarSite*> return_pols;
01187     return_pols.reserve(pols_n.size());
01188 
01189     int segId                   = seg->getId();
01190     bool map2md                 = _map2md[seg->getName()];
01191 
01192     vector<Fragment*> ::iterator fit;
01193     for (fit = seg->Fragments().begin();
01194          fit < seg->Fragments().end();
01195          ++fit) {
01196 
01197         Fragment *frag = *fit;
01198 
01199         // Retrieve polar-site data for this fragment
01200         string idkey                = frag->getName() + seg->getName()
01201                                     + seg->getMolecule()->getName();
01202         vector<int> polesInFrag     = _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx.at(idkey);
01203         vector<string> namesInFrag  = _alloc_frag_mpoleName.at(idkey);
01204         vector<double> weightsInFrag= _alloc_frag_weights.at(idkey);
01205 
01206         if (map2md && polesInFrag.size() != frag->Atoms().size()) {
01207             cout << endl
01208                  << "ERROR: Segment " << seg->getName()
01209                  << " Fragment " << frag->getName()
01210                  << ": MAP2MD = TRUE requires same number of polar "
01211                  << "sites as there are atoms to perform mapping. "
01212                  << endl;
01213             throw runtime_error("Check mapping or switch to map2md = 0");
01214         }
01215 
01216         matrix rotateMP2MD;
01217         vec translateMP2MD;
01218 
01219         // Determine transformation matrices to execute mapping
01220         if (!map2md) {
01221 
01222             vector<PolarSite*> trihedron_pol;
01223             vector<Atom*>      trihedron_atm;
01224 
01225             vector<int> trihedron_ints  = _alloc_frag_trihedron.at(idkey);
01226             vector<int> ::iterator iit;
01227             for (iit = trihedron_ints.begin();
01228                  iit < trihedron_ints.end();
01229                  ++iit) {
01230                 trihedron_pol.push_back(pols_n[(*iit)-1]);
01231 
01232                 // Find fragment-internal position = id of leg
01233                 for (int i = 0; i < polesInFrag.size(); ++i) {
01234                     if (polesInFrag[i] == (*iit)) {
01235                         trihedron_atm.push_back(frag->Atoms()[i]);
01236                     }
01237                 }
01238             }
01239 
01240 
01241             int symmetry = trihedron_pol.size();
01242             assert (trihedron_pol.size() == trihedron_atm.size() );
01243 
01244             vec xMD, yMD, zMD;
01245             vec xQM, yQM, zQM;
01246 
01247             if (symmetry == 3) {
01248                 vec r1MD = trihedron_atm[0]->getPos();
01249                 vec r2MD = trihedron_atm[1]->getPos();
01250                 vec r3MD = trihedron_atm[2]->getPos();
01251                 vec r1QM = trihedron_pol[0]->getPos();
01252                 vec r2QM = trihedron_pol[1]->getPos();
01253                 vec r3QM = trihedron_pol[2]->getPos();
01254 
01255                 xMD = r2MD - r1MD;
01256                 yMD = r3MD - r1MD;
01257                 xQM = r2QM - r1QM;
01258                 yQM = r3QM - r1QM;
01259 
01260                 zMD = xMD ^ yMD;
01261                 zQM = xQM ^ yQM;
01262 
01263                 yMD = zMD ^ xMD;
01264                 yQM = zQM ^ xQM;
01265 
01266                 xMD = xMD.normalize();
01267                 yMD = yMD.normalize();
01268                 zMD = zMD.normalize();
01269                 xQM = xQM.normalize();
01270                 yQM = yQM.normalize();
01271                 zQM = zQM.normalize();
01272             }
01273 
01274             else if (symmetry = 2) {
01275 
01276                 vec r1MD = trihedron_atm[0]->getPos();
01277                 vec r2MD = trihedron_atm[1]->getPos();
01278                 vec r1QM = trihedron_pol[0]->getPos();
01279                 vec r2QM = trihedron_pol[1]->getPos();
01280 
01281                 xMD = r2MD - r1MD;
01282                 xQM = r2QM - r1QM;
01283 
01284                 // Normalising not necessary, but recommendable, when doing...
01285                 xMD = xMD.normalize();
01286                 xQM = xQM.normalize();
01287 
01288                 vec yMDtmp = vec(0,0,0);
01289                 vec yQMtmp = vec(0,0,0);
01290 
01291     // ... this: Check whether one of the components is equal or close to
01292     // zero. If so, this easily gives a second leg for the trihedron.
01293     if      ( xMD.getX()*xMD.getX() < 1e-6 ) { yMDtmp = vec(1,0,0); }
01294     else if ( xMD.getY()*xMD.getY() < 1e-6 ) { yMDtmp = vec(0,1,0); }
01295     else if ( xMD.getZ()*xMD.getZ() < 1e-6 ) { yMDtmp = vec(0,0,1); }
01296     if      ( xQM.getX()*xQM.getX() < 1e-6 ) { yQMtmp = vec(1,0,0); }
01297     else if ( xQM.getY()*xQM.getY() < 1e-6 ) { yQMtmp = vec(0,1,0); }
01298     else if ( xQM.getZ()*xQM.getZ() < 1e-6 ) { yQMtmp = vec(0,0,1); }
01299 
01300     if ( abs(yMDtmp) < 0.5 ) {
01301     // All components of xMD are unequal to zero => division is safe.
01302     // Choose vector from plane with xMD * inPlaneVec = 0:
01303     double tmp_x = 1.;
01304     double tmp_y = 1.;
01305     double tmp_z = 1/xMD.getZ() * (-xMD.getX()*tmp_x - xMD.getY()*tmp_y);
01306     yMDtmp = vec(tmp_x, tmp_y, tmp_z);
01307     yMDtmp.normalize();
01308     }
01309     if ( abs(yQMtmp) < 0.5 ) {
01310     double tmp_x = 1.;
01311     double tmp_y = 1.;
01312     double tmp_z = 1/xQM.getZ() * (-xQM.getX()*tmp_x - xQM.getY()*tmp_y);
01313     yQMtmp = vec(tmp_x, tmp_y, tmp_z);
01314     yQMtmp.normalize();
01315     }
01316 
01317                 // Now proceed as for symmetry 3
01318                 zMD = xMD ^ yMDtmp;
01319                 yMD = zMD ^ xMD;
01320                 zQM = xQM ^ yQMtmp;
01321                 yQM = zQM ^ xQM;
01322 
01323                 xMD.normalize();
01324                 yMD.normalize();
01325                 zMD.normalize();
01326                 xQM.normalize();
01327                 yQM.normalize();
01328                 zQM.normalize();
01329             }
01330 
01331             else if (symmetry = 1) {
01332 
01333                 cout << endl
01334                      << "WARNING: Symmetry = 1 for fragment "
01335                      << frag->getName() << ": This will generate artifacts "
01336                      << "when mapping higher-rank multipoles (dipoles, ..)."
01337                      << endl;
01338 
01339                 xMD = vec(1,0,0);
01340                 yMD = vec(0,1,0);
01341                 zMD = vec(0,0,1);
01342                 xQM = vec(1,0,0);
01343                 yQM = vec(0,1,0);
01344                 zQM = vec(0,0,1);
01345             }
01346 
01347             else {
01348                 cout << endl
01349                      << "NOTE: Invalid definition of local frame in fragment "
01350                      << frag->getName();
01351                 cout << ". Assuming point particle for mapping. "
01352                      << endl;
01353                 cout << endl
01354                      << "WARNING: Symmetry = 1 for fragment "
01355                      << frag->getName() << ": This will generate artifacts "
01356                      << "when mapping higher-rank multipoles (dipoles, ..)."
01357                      << endl;
01358 
01359                 xMD = vec(1,0,0);
01360                 yMD = vec(0,1,0);
01361                 zMD = vec(0,0,1);
01362                 xQM = vec(1,0,0);
01363                 yQM = vec(0,1,0);
01364                 zQM = vec(0,0,1);
01365             }
01366 
01367             matrix rotMD = matrix(xMD, yMD, zMD);
01368             matrix rotMP = matrix(xQM, yQM, zQM);
01369 
01370             rotateMP2MD = rotMD * rotMP.Transpose();
01371 
01372 
01373             // ++++++++++++++++++ //
01374             // Transform fragment //
01375             // ++++++++++++++++++ //
01376 
01377 
01378             vec CoMP = vec(0.,0.,0.);
01379             double W = 0.0;
01380             for (int i = 0; i < polesInFrag.size(); ++i) {
01381 
01382                 double weight = weightsInFrag[i];
01383 
01384                 vec pos = pols_n[polesInFrag[i]-1]->getPos();
01385 
01386                 CoMP += weight*pos;
01387                 W += weight;
01388 
01389             }
01390             CoMP /= W;
01391 
01392             translateMP2MD = frag->getCoMD() - CoMP;
01393 
01394         }
01395 
01396         // Create polar sites
01397         for (int i = 0; i < polesInFrag.size(); i++) {
01398 
01399             string name             = namesInFrag[i];
01400             int poleId              = polesInFrag[i];
01401 
01402             PolarSite *templ        = pols_n[poleId-1];
01403             PolarSite *newSite      = new PolarSite(-1, name);
01404             newSite->ImportFrom(templ);
01405 
01406             // Shift + rotate
01407             if (!map2md) {
01408                 newSite->Translate(translateMP2MD);
01409                 newSite->Rotate(rotateMP2MD, frag->getCoMD());
01410             }
01411             else {
01412                 vec mdpos = frag->Atoms()[i]->getPos();
01413                 newSite->setPos(mdpos);
01414                 if (newSite->getRank() > 0) {
01415                     print_huge_map2md_warning = true;
01416                 }
01417             }
01418 
01419             newSite->Charge(0);
01420             
01421             return_pols.push_back(newSite);
01422 
01423         }
01424     } // End loop over fragments
01425 
01426     if (print_huge_map2md_warning) {
01427         cout << endl << endl
01428              << "**************************************************************"
01429              << "WARNING: MAP2MD = TRUE while using higher-rank multipoles can "
01430              << "mess up the orientation of those multipoles if the coordinate "
01431              << "frame used in the .mps file does not agree with the global MD "
01432              << "frame. If you know what you are doing - proceed ... "
01433              << "**************************************************************"
01434              << endl;
01435     }
01436 
01437     return return_pols;
01438 }
01439 
01440 
01441 vector<PolarSite*> XMP::Parse_GDMA(string filename, int state) {
01442 
01443     int poleCount = 1;
01444     double Q0_total = 0.0;
01445     string units = "";
01446     bool useDefaultPs = true;
01447 
01448     vector<PolarSite*> poles;
01449     PolarSite *thisPole = NULL;
01450 
01451     vector<double> Qs; // <- multipole moments
01452     double         P1; // <- dipole polarizability
01453 
01454     std::string line;
01455     std::ifstream intt;
01456     intt.open(filename.c_str());
01457 
01458     if (intt.is_open() ) {
01459         while ( intt.good() ) {
01460 
01461             std::getline(intt, line);
01462             vector<string> split;
01463             Tokenizer toker(line, " ");
01464             toker.ToVector(split);
01465 
01466             if ( !split.size()      ||
01467                   split[0] == "!"   ||
01468                   split[0].substr(0,1) == "!" ) { continue; }
01469 
01470     // ! Interesting information here, e.g.
01471     // ! DCV2T opt
01472     // ! SP        RB3LYP          6-311+G(d,p)
01473     // Units bohr
01474     //
01475     // C          -4.2414603400   -3.8124751600    0.0017575736    Rank  2
01476     //  -0.3853409355
01477     //  -0.0002321905   0.2401559510   0.6602334308
01478     //  -0.7220625314   0.0004894995  -0.0003833545   0.4526409813  -0.50937399
01479     //  P 1.75
01480 
01481 
01482             // Units used
01483             if ( split[0] == "Units") {
01484                 units = split[1];
01485                 if (units != "bohr" && units != "angstrom") {
01486                     throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
01487                                             + filename + " not supported.");
01488                 }
01489             }
01490 
01491             // element,  position,  rank limit
01492             else if ( split.size() == 6 ) {
01493 
01494                 Qs.clear();
01495                 P1 = -1.;
01496 
01497                 int id = poleCount++;  // <- starts from 1
01498                 string name = split[0];
01499 
01500                 double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
01501                 double ANGSTROM2NM = 0.1;
01502                 double x, y, z;
01503 
01504                 if (units == "bohr") {
01505                     x = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
01506                     y = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
01507                     z = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[3]);
01508                 }
01509                 else if (units == "angstrom") {
01510                     x = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
01511                     y = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
01512                     z = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[3]);
01513                 }
01514                 else {
01515                     throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
01516                                             + filename + " not supported.");
01517                 }
01518 
01519                 vec pos = vec(x,y,z);
01520 
01521                 int rank = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[5]);
01522 
01523                 PolarSite *newPole = new PolarSite(id, name);
01524                 newPole->setRank(rank);
01525                 newPole->setPos(pos);
01526                 poles.push_back(newPole);
01527                 thisPole = newPole;
01528 
01529             }
01530 
01531             // 'P', dipole polarizability
01532             else if ( split[0] == "P" && split.size() == 2 ) {
01533                 P1 = 1e-3 * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
01534                 thisPole->setPs(P1, state);
01535                 useDefaultPs = false;
01536             }
01537 
01538             // multipole line
01539             else {
01540 
01541                 int lineRank = int( sqrt(thisPole->getQs(state).size()) + 0.5 );
01542 
01543                 if (lineRank == 0) {
01544                     Q0_total += boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[0]);
01545                 }
01546 
01547                 for (int i = 0; i < split.size(); i++) {
01548 
01549                     double qXYZ = boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[i]);
01550 
01551                     // Convert e*(a_0)^k to e*(nm)^k where k = rank
01552                     double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
01553                     qXYZ *= pow(BOHR2NM, lineRank); // OVERRIDE
01554 
01555                     Qs.push_back(qXYZ);
01556 
01557                 }
01558                 thisPole->setQs(Qs, state);
01559             }
01560 
01561         } /* Exit loop over lines */
01562     }
01563     else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << filename << endl;
01564            throw runtime_error("Please supply input file.");           }
01565 
01566 
01567     printf("\n... ... ... Reading %-25s -> Q0(Sum) = %+1.3f ",
01568                           filename.c_str(),       Q0_total);
01569 
01570     if (useDefaultPs) {
01571 
01572         cout << endl << "... ... ... NOTE Using default Thole polarizabilities "
01573              << "for charge state " << state << ". ";
01574 
01575         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pol;
01576         for (pol = poles.begin(); pol < poles.end(); ++pol) {
01577             string elem = (*pol)->getName();
01578             double alpha = 0.0;
01579             // Original set of Thole polarizabilites
01580             if      (elem == "C") { alpha = 1.75e-3;  } // <- conversion from
01581             else if (elem == "H") { alpha = 0.696e-3; } //    A³ to nm³ = 10⁻³
01582             else if (elem == "N") { alpha = 1.073e-3; }
01583             else if (elem == "O") { alpha = 0.837e-3; }
01584             else if (elem == "S") { alpha = 2.926e-3; }
01585             // Different set of Thole polarizabilities
01586             //if      (elem == "C") { alpha = 1.334e-3; } // <- conversion from
01587             //else if (elem == "H") { alpha = 0.496e-3; } //    A³ to nm³ = 10⁻³
01588             //else if (elem == "N") { alpha = 1.073e-3; }
01589             //else if (elem == "O") { alpha = 0.837e-3; }
01590             //else if (elem == "S") { alpha = 3.300e-3; }
01591             else { throw runtime_error("No polarizability given "
01592                                        "for polar site type " + elem + ". "); }
01593             (*pol)->setPs(alpha, state);
01594         }
01595     }
01596 
01597     return poles;
01598 }
01599 
01600 
01601 bool XMP::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
01602 
01603     cout << endl
01604          << "... ... Load multipole definition, collect jobs: "
01605          << flush;
01606 
01607     Collect_XML(_xml_file, top); // <- Allocate polar sites to fragments    
01608     Collect_EMP(_emp_file, top); // <- Collect segs .mps => Background .mps
01609     Collect_JOB(_job_file, top); // <- Collect jobs .mps => Foreground .mps
01610     Collect_MPS(top);            // <- Parse all .mps files (fore-, background)
01611 
01612 
01613     // ++++++++++++++++++++ //
01614     // Ridigidfy + Estatify //
01615     // ++++++++++++++++++++ //
01616 
01617     // Rigidify segments, fragments
01618     if (!top->isRigid()) {
01619         bool isRigid = top->Rigidify();
01620         if (!isRigid) { return 0; }
01621     }
01622     else {
01623         cout << endl
01624              << "... ... System is already rigidified.";
01625     }
01626 
01627     // Create polar sites
01628     if (top->isEStatified() == false) {
01629         this->Create_MPOLS(top);
01630         cout << endl
01631              << "... ... Created " << top->PolarSites().size()
01632              << " multipole sites. "
01633              << flush;
01634     }
01635     else {
01636         cout << endl
01637              << "... ... System is already estatified. "
01638              << "This prohibits running XMultipole. "
01639              << flush;
01640     }
01641 
01642     // To check rotation into global frame
01643     if (_pdb_check != "") {
01644         cout << endl
01645              << "... ... Writing polar-site coordinates to "
01646              << _pdb_check << ". "
01647              << flush;
01648 
01649         string mpNAME   = _pdb_check;
01650         FILE *mpPDB     = NULL;
01651         mpPDB           = fopen(mpNAME.c_str(), "w");
01652 
01653         vector<Segment*>::iterator sit;
01654         for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
01655              sit < top->Segments().end();
01656              ++sit) {
01657             (*sit)->WritePDB(mpPDB, "Multipoles", "MD");
01658         }
01659         fclose(mpPDB);
01660     }
01661 
01662     
01663     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01664     // Create + start threads (Job Ops)  //
01665     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01666 
01667     vector<JobXMP*> jobOps;    
01668 
01669     _nextXJob = _XJobs.begin();
01670 
01671     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
01672         JobXMP *newOp = new JobXMP(id, top, this);
01673         jobOps.push_back(newOp);
01674     }
01675 
01676     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
01677         jobOps[id]->InitSlotData(top);
01678     }
01679 
01680     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
01681         jobOps[id]->Start();
01682     }
01683 
01684     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
01685         jobOps[id]->WaitDone();
01686     }
01687 
01688     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
01689         delete jobOps[id];
01690     }
01691 
01692     jobOps.clear();
01693 
01694 
01695     FILE *out;
01696     out = fopen(this->_outFile.c_str(), "w");
01697     vector<XJob*> :: iterator jit;
01698     for (jit = _XJobs.begin(); jit < _XJobs.end(); ++jit) {
01699         (*jit)->WriteInfoLine(out);
01700     }
01701     fclose(out);
01702 
01703 }
01704 
01705 
01706 
01707 // ========================================================================== //
01708 //                            JOBXMP MEMBER FUNCTIONS                         //
01709 // ========================================================================== //
01710 
01711 
01712 void XMP::JobXMP::InitSlotData(Topology *top) {
01713 
01714     vector< Segment* > ::iterator sitRef;
01715     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sitNew;
01716     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pitRef;
01717     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pitNew;
01718 
01719     _polarSites.resize(top->Segments().size());
01720     assert(top->Segments().size() == _polarSites.size());
01721 
01722     for (sitRef = top->Segments().begin(), sitNew = _polarSites.begin();
01723          sitRef < top->Segments().end();
01724          ++sitRef, ++sitNew) {
01725 
01726         (*sitNew).resize((*sitRef)->PolarSites().size());
01727 
01728         for (pitRef = (*sitRef)->PolarSites().begin(),
01729              pitNew = (*sitNew).begin();
01730              pitRef < (*sitRef)->PolarSites().end();
01731              ++pitRef, ++ pitNew) {
01732 
01733             *pitNew = new PolarSite();
01734             (*pitNew)->ImportFrom(*pitRef, "full");
01735             (*pitNew)->Charge(0);
01736         }
01737     }
01738 }
01739 
01740 
01741 void XMP::JobXMP::Run(void) {
01742 
01743     while (true) {
01744         _job = _master->RequestNextJob(_id, _top);
01745 
01746         if (_job == NULL) { break; }
01747         else { this->EvalJob(_top, _job); }
01748     }
01749 }
01750 
01751 
01752 void XMP::JobXMP::EvalJob(Topology *top, XJob *job) {
01753 
01754     double int2eV = 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12) * 1.602176487e-19 / 1.000e-9;
01755 
01756     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01757     // Adapt polar sites          //
01758     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01759     _polarSites_job = _polarSites;
01760 
01761     int subs_here1 = job->getSeg1Id();
01762     int subs_here2 = job->getSeg2Id();
01763 
01764     vector<PolarSite*> subs1_raw = _master->_mpsFile_pSites_job[job->getMPS1()];
01765     vector<PolarSite*> subs2_raw = _master->_mpsFile_pSites_job[job->getMPS2()];
01766     vector<PolarSite*> subs1 = _master->Map_MPols_To_Seg(subs1_raw,job->Seg1());
01767     vector<PolarSite*> subs2 = _master->Map_MPols_To_Seg(subs2_raw,job->Seg2());
01768 
01769     _polarSites_job[subs_here1-1] = subs1;
01770     _polarSites_job[subs_here2-1] = subs2;
01771     
01772     
01773 
01774     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01775     // Define polarization sphere //
01776     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01777 
01778     vec center = job->Center(); 
01779     // vec center = job->Seg1()->getPos(); // UNCOMMENT TO COMPARE TO EMULTIPOLE
01780 
01781     this->_segsPolSphere.clear(); // <- Segments    within cutoff
01782     this->_segsOutSphere.clear(); // <- Segments    within cutoff1, cutoff2
01783     this->_polsPolSphere.clear(); // <- Polar sites within cutoff
01784     this->_polsOutSphere.clear(); // <- Polar sites within cutoff1, cutoff2
01785 
01786     vector<Segment*> ::iterator sit;
01787     for (sit = top->Segments().begin(); sit < top->Segments().end(); ++sit) {
01788 
01789         double r12 = abs(_top->PbShortestConnect((*sit)->getPos(), center));
01790 
01791         if      ( r12 > _master->_cutoff2) { continue; }
01792 
01793         else if ( r12 > _master->_cutoff ) {
01794             _segsOutSphere.push_back(*sit);
01795             _polsOutSphere.push_back( _polarSites_job[(*sit)->getId() - 1] );
01796         }
01797         else {
01798             _segsPolSphere.push_back(*sit);
01799             _polsPolSphere.push_back( _polarSites_job[(*sit)->getId() - 1] );
01800         }
01801     }
01802 
01803     if (_master->_maverick) {
01804         cout << endl
01805              << "... ... ... Segments in polarization sphere: "
01806              << _segsPolSphere.size()
01807              << "; segments in static shell: "
01808              << _segsOutSphere.size()
01809              << flush;
01810     }
01811 
01812     job->setSizePol(_polsPolSphere.size());
01813     job->setSizeShell(_polsOutSphere.size());
01814 
01815 //    FILE *out;
01816 //    string shellFile = "OuterShell.pdb";
01817 //    out = fopen(shellFile.c_str(), "w");
01818 //    for (sit = _segsOutSphere.begin(); sit < _segsOutSphere.end(); ++sit) {
01819 //        (*sit)->WritePDB(out, "Multipoles", "");
01820 //    }
01821 //    fclose(out);
01822 //
01823 //    shellFile = "InnerShell.pdb";
01824 //    out = fopen(shellFile.c_str(), "w");
01825 //    for (sit = _segsPolSphere.begin(); sit < _segsPolSphere.end(); ++sit) {
01826 //        (*sit)->WritePDB(out, "Multipoles", "");
01827 //    }
01828 //    fclose(out);
01829 //
01830 //    shellFile = "Pair.pdb";
01831 //    out = fopen(shellFile.c_str(), "w");
01832 //    job->Seg1()->WritePDB(out, "Multipoles", "");
01833 //    job->Seg2()->WritePDB(out, "Multipoles", "");
01834 //    fclose(out);
01835 
01836 
01837     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01838     // (De-)polarize, charge to N //
01839     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01840 
01841     if (job->StartFromCPT()) {
01842 
01843         if (_master->_maverick) {
01844             cout << endl
01845                  << "... ... ... Loading induced dipoles from .cpt file. "
01846                  << flush;
01847         }
01848         assert(false); // Load induced dipole moments from file
01849     }
01850 
01851     else {
01852 
01853         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit;
01854         vector< PolarSite* >         ::iterator pit;
01855 
01856         // Depolarize inner sphere
01857         for (sit = _polsPolSphere.begin(); sit < _polsPolSphere.end(); ++sit) {
01858         for (pit = (*sit).begin(); pit < (*sit).end(); ++pit) {
01859             (*pit)->Depolarize();
01860             (*pit)->Charge(0); // <- Not necessarily neutral state
01861         }}
01862 
01863         // Depolarize outer shell
01864         for (sit = _polsOutSphere.begin(); sit < _polsOutSphere.end(); ++sit) {
01865         for (pit = (*sit).begin(); pit < (*sit).end(); ++pit) {
01866             (*pit)->Depolarize();
01867             (*pit)->Charge(0); // <- Not necessarily neutral state
01868         }}
01869     }
01870 
01871     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01872     // Compute state energy       //
01873     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01874 
01875     double  E_state  = 0.0;
01876     int     iter     = 0;
01877     int     state    = 0;
01878 
01879     if (_master->_induce) iter      = this->Induce(state, job);
01880     if (_master->_induce) E_state   = this->Energy(state, job);
01881     else                  E_state   = this->EnergyStatic(state, job);
01882 
01883     job->setEnergy(E_state*int2eV);
01884 
01885 
01886 
01887     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01888     // Write Checkpoint File      //
01889     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01890 
01891     if (_master->_write_chk) {
01892 
01893         FILE *out;
01894         string chk_file = job->getTag()+_master->_write_chk_suffix+".chk";
01895         out = fopen(chk_file.c_str(), "w");
01896 
01897         vector< PolarSite* >         ::iterator pit;
01898 
01899         // Save induction state of polarization sphere
01900         for (sit = _segsPolSphere.begin(); sit < _segsPolSphere.end(); ++sit) {
01901 
01902             int segId = (*sit)->getId();
01903 
01904             if (segId == job->getSeg1Id() || segId == job->getSeg2Id()) {
01905                 continue;
01906             }
01907 
01908             for (pit = _polarSites_job[segId-1].begin();
01909                  pit < _polarSites_job[segId-1].end();
01910                  ++pit) {
01911                  (*pit)->WriteChkLine(out, _master->_chk_split_dpl,
01912                                            _master->_chk_format,
01913                                            _master->_chk_dpl_spacing);
01914             }
01915         }
01916 
01917         // Write point charges of outer sphere
01918         for (sit = _segsOutSphere.begin(); sit < _segsOutSphere.end(); ++sit) {
01919 
01920             int segId = (*sit)->getId();
01921 
01922             if (segId == job->getSeg1Id() || segId == job->getSeg2Id()) {
01923                 assert(false); // Central pair in outer shell? No!
01924             }
01925             for (pit = _polarSites_job[segId-1].begin();
01926                  pit < _polarSites_job[segId-1].end();
01927                  ++pit) {
01928                  (*pit)->WriteChkLine(out, false,
01929                                            _master->_chk_format,
01930                                            _master->_chk_dpl_spacing);
01931             }
01932         }
01933 
01934         fclose(out);
01935     }
01936 
01937     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01938     // Clean up polar sites       //
01939     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01940 
01941     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator cleanit;
01942     for (cleanit = subs1.begin(); cleanit < subs1.end(); ++cleanit) {
01943         delete *cleanit;
01944     }
01945     for (cleanit = subs2.begin(); cleanit < subs2.end(); ++cleanit) {
01946         delete *cleanit;
01947     }
01948     subs1.clear();
01949     subs2.clear();
01950 
01951 }
01952 
01953 
01954 int XMP::JobXMP::Induce(int state, XJob *job) {
01955 
01956     double wSOR = (state == 0) ? _master->_wSOR_N : _master->_wSOR_C;
01957     double eTOL = this->_master->_epsTol;
01958     int    maxI = this->_master->_maxIter;
01959 
01960     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
01961     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit2;
01962     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
01963     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
01964 
01965     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01966     // Inter-site fields (arising from perm. m'poles) //
01967     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01968 
01969 //    cout << endl << "... ... ... 0th-order field" << flush;
01970     for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
01971          sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
01972          ++sit1) {
01973     for (sit2 = sit1 + 1;
01974          sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
01975          ++sit2) {
01976 
01977          for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
01978          for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
01979 
01980              _actor.FieldPerm(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
01981          }}
01982     }}
01983 
01984     // +++++++++++++++++++ //
01985     // 1st-order induction //
01986     // +++++++++++++++++++ //
01987 
01988 //    cout << " | Induce " << endl;
01989     if (!job->StartFromCPT()) { // OVERRIDE
01990         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
01991              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
01992              ++sit1) {
01993 
01994              for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
01995                  (*pit1)->InduceDirect();
01996              }
01997         }
01998     }
01999     else {
02000         assert(false); // Load induced dipole moments from file
02001     }
02002 
02003 
02004 
02005     // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02006     // Higher-order induction //
02007     // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
02008 
02009     int iter = 0;
02010 //    boost::progress_timer T;
02011     for ( ; iter < maxI; ++iter) {
02012 
02013         // Reset fields FUx, FUy, FUz
02014 //        cout << "\r... ... ... Reset (" << iter << ")" << flush;
02015         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02016              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02017              ++sit1) {
02018 
02019             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02020                 (*pit1)->ResetFieldU();
02021             }
02022         }
02023 
02024         // Intra-site contribution to induction field
02025 //        cout << " | Intra-Site (" << iter << ")" << flush;
02026         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02027              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02028              ++sit1) {
02029 
02030             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02031             for (pit2 = pit1 + 1;        pit2 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit2) {
02032 
02033                 _actor.FieldIndu(*(*pit1),*(*pit2));                            // <- Intra-pair => zero out
02034             }}
02035         }
02036 
02037         // Inter-site contribution to induction field
02038 //        cout << " | Inter-Site (" << iter << ")" << flush;
02039         //boost::progress_display show_progress( _polsPolSphere.size() );
02040 //        T.restart();
02041         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02042              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02043              ++sit1) {
02044         for (sit2 = sit1 + 1;
02045              sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02046              ++sit2) {
02047 
02048             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02049             for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
02050 
02051                 _actor.FieldIndu(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));                           // <- Pair-environment => figure sth out
02052             }}
02053         }}
02054 //        cout << " | dt " << T.elapsed() << flush;
02055 
02056         // Induce again
02057 //        cout << " | Induce (" << iter << ")" << flush;
02058         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02059              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02060              ++sit1) {
02061 
02062              for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02063                  (*pit1)->Induce(wSOR);                                         // <- Okay if alpha = 0
02064              }
02065         }
02066 
02067         // Check for convergence
02068 //        cout << " | Check (" << iter << ")" << flush;
02069         bool converged = true;
02070         double maxdU = -1;
02071         double avgdU = 0.0;
02072         int    baseN = 0;
02073         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
02074              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02075              ++sit1) {
02076 
02077              for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02078                  double dU = (*pit1)->HistdU();
02079                  avgdU += dU;
02080                  ++baseN;
02081                  if ( dU > maxdU ) { maxdU = dU; }
02082                  if ( dU > eTOL ) { converged = false; }
02083              }
02084         }
02085         avgdU /= baseN;
02086         if (avgdU < eTOL/10.) { converged = true; }
02087 
02088 //        cout << " | MAX dU " << maxdU
02089 //             << " | AVG dU " << avgdU
02090 //             << " | SOR " << wSOR << flush;
02091 
02092         // Break if converged
02093         if      (converged) {
02094             break;
02095         }
02096         else if (iter == maxI - 1) {
02097             this->_master->LockCout();
02098             cout << endl << "... ... ... WARNING Induced multipoles for job "
02099                  << job->getId() << " did not converge to precision: "
02100                  << " AVG dU:U " << avgdU << flush;
02101             this->_master->UnlockCout();
02102             break;
02103         }
02104     }
02105 
02106     return iter;
02107 
02108 //    cout << endl << "... ... ... State " << state
02109 //         << " - wSOR " << wSOR
02110 //         << " - Iterations " << iter << flush;
02111 }
02112 
02113 
02114 double XMP::JobXMP::Energy(int state, XJob *job) {
02115 
02116     double int2eV = 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12) * 1.602176487e-19 / 1.000e-9;
02117 
02118     _actor.ResetEnergy();
02119     double E_Tot = 0.0;
02120 
02121     vector< Segment* >              ::iterator      seg1;
02122     vector< Segment* >              ::iterator      seg2;
02123     vector< vector<PolarSite*> >    ::iterator      sit1;
02124     vector< vector<PolarSite*> >    ::iterator      sit2;
02125     vector< PolarSite* >            ::iterator      pit1;
02126     vector< PolarSite* >            ::iterator      pit2;
02127 
02128     // +++++++++++++++++ //
02129     // Inter-site energy //
02130     // +++++++++++++++++ //
02131 
02132     for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin(), seg1 = _segsPolSphere.begin();
02133          sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02134          ++sit1, ++seg1) {
02135     for (sit2 = sit1 + 1, seg2 = seg1 + 1;
02136          sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
02137          ++sit2, ++seg2) {
02138 
02139         //if ( abs(_top->PbShortestConnect((*seg1)->getPos(),_seg->getPos()))
02140         //        > _master->_cutoff) { throw runtime_error("Not this."); }
02141 
02142         //cout << "\r... ... Calculating interaction energy for pair "
02143         //     << (*seg1)->getId() << "|" << (*seg2)->getId() << "   " << flush;
02144 
02145 
02146         for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02147         for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
02148 
02149             //(*pit1)->PrintInfo(cout);
02150             //(*pit2)->PrintInfo(cout);
02151 
02152             E_Tot += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));                    // <- Change here
02153 
02154         }}
02155     }}
02156 
02157     // ++++++++++++++++++ //
02158     // Outer-Shell energy //
02159     // ++++++++++++++++++ //
02160 
02161     double E_Out = 0.0;
02162 
02163     vector< PolarSite* > central1 = _polarSites_job[ job->getSeg1Id() - 1 ];
02164     vector< PolarSite* > central2 = _polarSites_job[ job->getSeg2Id() - 1 ];
02165 
02166     for (sit1 = _polsOutSphere.begin(); sit1 < _polsOutSphere.end(); ++sit1) {
02167         for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02168             for (pit2 = central1.begin(); pit2 < central1.end(); ++pit2) {
02169                 E_Out += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));                // <- Change here
02170             }
02171         }
02172     }
