02173     for (sit1 = _polsOutSphere.begin(); sit1 < _polsOutSphere.end(); ++sit1) {
02174         for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
02175             for (pit2 = central2.begin(); pit2 < central2.end(); ++pit2) {
02176                 E_Out += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));                // <- Change here
02177             }
02178         }
02179     }
02180     E_Tot += E_Out;
02181 
02182 
02183     if (_master->_maverick) {
02184         cout << endl 
02185              << "... ... ... ... E(" << state << ") = " << E_Tot * int2eV
02186              << " eV = (P ~) " << _actor.getEP()       * int2eV
02187              << " + (U ~) " << _actor.getEU_INTER() * int2eV
02188              << " + (U o) " << _actor.getEU_INTRA() * int2eV
02189              << " , (O ~) " << E_Out << " eV"
02190              << flush;
02191     }
02192 
02193     return E_Tot;
02194 }
02195 
02196 
02197 double XMP::JobXMP::EnergyStatic(int state, XJob *job) {
02198 
02199     double int2eV = 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12) * 1.602176487e-19 / 1.000e-9;
02200 
02201     _actor.ResetEnergy();
02202     double E_Tot = 0.0;
02203 
02204     vector< Segment* >              ::iterator      seg1;
02205     vector< Segment* >              ::iterator      seg2;
02206     vector< vector<PolarSite*> >    ::iterator      sit1;
02207     vector< vector<PolarSite*> >    ::iterator      sit2;
02208     vector< PolarSite* >            ::iterator      pit1;
02209     vector< PolarSite* >            ::iterator      pit2;
02210 
02211     vector< PolarSite* > central1 = _polarSites_job[ job->getSeg1Id() - 1 ];
02212     vector< PolarSite* > central2 = _polarSites_job[ job->getSeg2Id() - 1 ];
02213 
02214     for (seg1 = _segsPolSphere.begin(); seg1 < _segsPolSphere.end(); ++seg1) {
02215 
02216         int id = (*seg1)->getId();
02217 
02218         if (id == job->getSeg1Id() || id == job->getSeg2Id() ) {
02219             continue;
02220         }
02221 
02222         for (pit1 = _polarSites_job[id-1].begin();
02223              pit1 < _polarSites_job[id-1].end();
02224              ++pit1) {
02225             for (pit2 = central1.begin();
02226                  pit2 < central1.end();
02227                  ++pit2) {
02228 
02229                  E_Tot += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));               // <- Check here
02230             }
02231             for (pit2 = central2.begin();
02232                  pit2 < central2.end();
02233                  ++pit2) {
02234 
02235                  E_Tot += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));               // <- Check here
02236             }
02237         }
02238     }
02239 
02240     if (_master->_maverick) {
02241         cout << endl 
02242              << "... ... ... ... E(" << state << ") = " << E_Tot * int2eV
02243              << " eV = (P ~) " << _actor.getEP()       * int2eV
02244              << " + (U ~) " << _actor.getEU_INTER() * int2eV
02245              << " + (U o) " << _actor.getEU_INTRA() * int2eV << " eV"
02246              << ", statics only. "
02247              << flush;
02248     }
02249 
02250     return E_Tot;
02251 }
02252 
02253 
02254 XMP::XJob *XMP::RequestNextJob(int id, Topology *top) {
02255 
02256     _nextJobMutex.Lock();
02257 
02258     XJob *workOnThis;
02259 
02260     if (_nextXJob == _XJobs.end()) {
02261         workOnThis = NULL;
02262     }
02263     else {
02264         workOnThis = *_nextXJob;
02265         _nextXJob++;
02266         cout << endl 
02267              << "... ... Thread " << id << " evaluating job "
02268              << workOnThis->getId() << " " << workOnThis->getTag()
02269              << flush;
02270     }
02271 
02272     _nextJobMutex.Unlock();
02273 
02274     return workOnThis;
02275 }
02276 
02277 
02278 
02279 // ========================================================================== //
02280 //                         XINTERACTOR MEMBER FUNCTIONS                       //
02281 // ========================================================================== //
02282 
02283 
02287 inline double XMP::XInteractor::PotentialPerm(vec r,
02288                                                      PolarSite &pol) {
02289 
02290     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
02291     e12  = pol.getPos() - r;
02292     R    = 1/abs(e12);
02293     R2   = R*R;
02294     R3   = R2*R;
02295     R4   = R3*R;
02296     R5   = R4*R;
02297     e12 *= R;
02298 
02299     
02300 
02301 
02302     rbx = - pol._locX * e12;
02303     rby = - pol._locY * e12;
02304     rbz = - pol._locZ * e12;
02305 
02306     double phi00 = 0.0;
02307     
02308         phi00 += T00_00() * pol.Q00;
02309     
02310     if (pol._rank > 0) {        
02311         phi00 += T00_1x() * pol.Q1x;
02312         phi00 += T00_1y() * pol.Q1y;
02313         phi00 += T00_1z() * pol.Q1z;        
02314     }
02315         
02316     if (pol._rank > 1) {
02317         phi00 += T00_20()  * pol.Q20;
02318         phi00 += T00_21c() * pol.Q21c;
02319         phi00 += T00_21s() * pol.Q21s;
02320         phi00 += T00_22c() * pol.Q22c;
02321         phi00 += T00_22s() * pol.Q22s;
02322     }
02323 
02324     return phi00;
02325 }
02326 
02330 inline vec XMP::XInteractor::FieldPermESF(vec r,
02331                                                  PolarSite &pol) {
02332     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
02333     e12  = pol.getPos() - r;
02334     R    = 1/abs(e12);
02335     R2   = R*R;
02336     R3   = R2*R;
02337     R4   = R3*R;
02338     R5   = R4*R;
02339     e12 *= R;
02340 
02341         rax = e12.getX();
02342         ray = e12.getY();
02343         raz = e12.getZ();
02344         rbx = - rax;
02345         rby = - ray;
02346         rbz = - raz;
02347 
02348         cxx = 1;
02349         cxy = 0;
02350         cxz = 0;
02351         cyx = 0;
02352         cyy = 1;
02353         cyz = 0;
02354         czx = 0;
02355         czy = 0;
02356         czz = 1;
02357 
02358     double Fx = 0.0;
02359     double Fy = 0.0;
02360     double Fz = 0.0;
02361 
02362     // Field generated by rank-0 m'pole
02363         Fx += T1x_00() * pol.Q00;
02364         Fy += T1y_00() * pol.Q00;
02365         Fz += T1z_00() * pol.Q00;
02366 
02367     // Field generated by rank-1 m'pole
02368     if (pol._rank > 0) {
02369         Fx += T1x_1x() * pol.Q1x;
02370         Fx += T1x_1y() * pol.Q1y;
02371         Fx += T1x_1z() * pol.Q1z;
02372 
02373         Fy += T1y_1x() * pol.Q1x;
02374         Fy += T1y_1y() * pol.Q1y;
02375         Fy += T1y_1z() * pol.Q1z;
02376 
02377         Fz += T1z_1x() * pol.Q1x;
02378         Fz += T1z_1y() * pol.Q1y;
02379         Fz += T1z_1z() * pol.Q1z;
02380     }
02381 
02382     // Field generated by rank-2 m'pole
02383     if (pol._rank > 1) {
02384         Fx += T1x_20()  * pol.Q20;
02385         Fx += T1x_21c() * pol.Q21c;
02386         Fx += T1x_21s() * pol.Q21s;
02387         Fx += T1x_22c() * pol.Q22c;
02388         Fx += T1x_22s() * pol.Q22s;
02389 
02390         Fy += T1y_20()  * pol.Q20;
02391         Fy += T1y_21c() * pol.Q21c;
02392         Fy += T1y_21s() * pol.Q21s;
02393         Fy += T1y_22c() * pol.Q22c;
02394         Fy += T1y_22s() * pol.Q22s;
02395 
02396         Fz += T1z_20()  * pol.Q20;
02397         Fz += T1z_21c() * pol.Q21c;
02398         Fz += T1z_21s() * pol.Q21s;
02399         Fz += T1z_22c() * pol.Q22c;
02400         Fz += T1z_22s() * pol.Q22s;
02401     }
02402 
02403     return vec(Fx, Fy, Fz);
02404 }
02405 
02409 inline void XMP::XInteractor::FieldInduAlpha(PolarSite &pol1,
02410                                                     PolarSite &pol2) {
02411     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
02412     e12  = pol2.getPos() - pol1.getPos();
02413     R    = 1/abs(e12);
02414     R2   = R*R;
02415     R3   = R2*R;
02416     R4   = R3*R;
02417     R5   = R4*R;
02418     e12 *= R;
02419 
02420     // Thole damping init.
02421     a    = _xm->_aDamp;
02422     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
02423 
02424 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
02425 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
02426 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
02427 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
02428 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
02429 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
02430 
02431         rax = e12.getX();
02432         ray = e12.getY();
02433         raz = e12.getZ();
02434         rbx = - rax;
02435         rby = - ray;
02436         rbz = - raz;
02437 
02438 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
02439 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
02440 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
02441 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
02442 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
02443 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
02444 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
02445 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
02446 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
02447 
02448         cxx = 1;
02449         cxy = 0;
02450         cxz = 0;
02451         cyx = 0;
02452         cyy = 1;
02453         cyz = 0;
02454         czx = 0;
02455         czy = 0;
02456         czz = 1;
02457 
02458     // Fields generated by rank-1 induced m'poles
02459 
02460     if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
02461         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02462         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02463         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02464         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02465         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02466         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02467         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02468         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02469         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02470 
02471         pol2.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
02472         pol2.FUx += TU1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
02473         pol2.FUx += TU1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
02474         pol2.FUy += TU1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
02475         pol2.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
02476         pol2.FUy += TU1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
02477         pol2.FUz += TU1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
02478         pol2.FUz += TU1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
02479         pol2.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;
02480     }
02481     else {
02482         pol1.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02483         pol1.FUx += T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02484         pol1.FUx += T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02485         pol1.FUy += T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02486         pol1.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02487         pol1.FUy += T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02488         pol1.FUz += T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02489         pol1.FUz += T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02490         pol1.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02491 
02492         pol2.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
02493         pol2.FUx += T1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
02494         pol2.FUx += T1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
02495         pol2.FUy += T1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
02496         pol2.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
02497         pol2.FUy += T1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
02498         pol2.FUz += T1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
02499         pol2.FUz += T1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
02500         pol2.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;
02501     }
02502 }
02503 
02507 inline void XMP::XInteractor::FieldIndu(PolarSite &pol1,
02508                                                PolarSite &pol2) {
02509 
02510     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
02511     //          This implies that induced = - alpha * field
02512     e12  = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
02513     R    = 1/abs(e12);
02514     R2   = R*R;
02515     R3   = R2*R;
02516     R4   = R3*R;
02517     R5   = R4*R;
02518     e12 *= R;
02519 
02520     // Thole damping init.
02521     a    = _xm->_aDamp;
02522     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
02523 
02524 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
02525 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
02526 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
02527 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
02528 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
02529 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
02530 
02531         rax = e12.getX();
02532         ray = e12.getY();
02533         raz = e12.getZ();
02534         rbx = - rax;
02535         rby = - ray;
02536         rbz = - raz;
02537 
02538 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
02539 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
02540 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
02541 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
02542 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
02543 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
02544 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
02545 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
02546 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
02547 
02548         cxx = 1;
02549         cxy = 0;
02550         cxz = 0;
02551         cyx = 0;
02552         cyy = 1;
02553         cyz = 0;
02554         czx = 0;
02555         czy = 0;
02556         czz = 1;
02557 
02558     // Fields generated by rank-1 induced m'poles
02559 
02560     if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
02561         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02562         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02563         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02564         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02565         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02566         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02567         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02568         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02569         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02570 
02571         pol2.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
02572         pol2.FUx += TU1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
02573         pol2.FUx += TU1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
02574         pol2.FUy += TU1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
02575         pol2.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
02576         pol2.FUy += TU1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
02577         pol2.FUz += TU1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
02578         pol2.FUz += TU1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
02579         pol2.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;
02580     }
02581     else {
02582         pol1.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02583         pol1.FUx += T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02584         pol1.FUx += T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02585         pol1.FUy += T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02586         pol1.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02587         pol1.FUy += T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02588         pol1.FUz += T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02589         pol1.FUz += T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02590         pol1.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02591 
02592         pol2.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
02593         pol2.FUx += T1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
02594         pol2.FUx += T1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
02595         pol2.FUy += T1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
02596         pol2.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
02597         pol2.FUy += T1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
02598         pol2.FUz += T1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
02599         pol2.FUz += T1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
02600         pol2.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;  
02601     }
02602 }
02603 
02607 inline void XMP::XInteractor::FieldPerm(PolarSite &pol1,
02608                                                PolarSite &pol2) {
02609 
02610     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
02611     //          This implies that induced = - alpha * field
02612     e12  = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
02613     R    = 1/abs(e12);
02614     R2   = R*R;
02615     R3   = R2*R;
02616     R4   = R3*R;
02617     R5   = R4*R;
02618     e12 *= R;
02619 
02620 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
02621 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
02622 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
02623 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
02624 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
02625 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
02626 
02627         rax = e12.getX();
02628         ray = e12.getY();
02629         raz = e12.getZ();
02630         rbx = - rax;
02631         rby = - ray;
02632         rbz = - raz;
02633 
02634     if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
02635 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
02636 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
02637 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
02638 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
02639 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
02640 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
02641 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
02642 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
02643 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
02644 
02645         cxx = 1;
02646         cxy = 0;
02647         cxz = 0;
02648         cyx = 0;
02649         cyy = 1;
02650         cyz = 0;
02651         czx = 0;
02652         czy = 0;
02653         czz = 1;
02654     }
02655 
02656     // Fields generated by rank-0 m'poles
02657         pol1.FPx += T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
02658         pol1.FPy += T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
02659         pol1.FPz += T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
02660 
02661         pol2.FPx += T00_1x() * pol1.Q00;
02662         pol2.FPy += T00_1y() * pol1.Q00;
02663         pol2.FPz += T00_1z() * pol1.Q00;
02664 
02665     // Fields generated by rank-1 m'poles
02666     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
02667         pol1.FPx += T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
02668         pol1.FPx += T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
02669         pol1.FPx += T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
02670         pol1.FPy += T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
02671         pol1.FPy += T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
02672         pol1.FPy += T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
02673         pol1.FPz += T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
02674         pol1.FPz += T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
02675         pol1.FPz += T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
02676     }
02677     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
02678         pol2.FPx += T1x_1x() * pol1.Q1x;
02679         pol2.FPx += T1y_1x() * pol1.Q1y;
02680         pol2.FPx += T1z_1x() * pol1.Q1z;
02681         pol2.FPy += T1x_1y() * pol1.Q1x;
02682         pol2.FPy += T1y_1y() * pol1.Q1y;
02683         pol2.FPy += T1z_1y() * pol1.Q1z;
02684         pol2.FPz += T1x_1z() * pol1.Q1x;
02685         pol2.FPz += T1y_1z() * pol1.Q1y;
02686         pol2.FPz += T1z_1z() * pol1.Q1z;
02687     }
02688 
02689     // Fields generated by rank-2 m'poles
02690     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
02691         pol1.FPx += T1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
02692         pol1.FPx += T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
02693         pol1.FPx += T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
02694         pol1.FPx += T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
02695         pol1.FPx += T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
02696 
02697         pol1.FPy += T1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
02698         pol1.FPy += T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
02699         pol1.FPy += T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
02700         pol1.FPy += T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
02701         pol1.FPy += T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
02702 
02703         pol1.FPz += T1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
02704         pol1.FPz += T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
02705         pol1.FPz += T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
02706         pol1.FPz += T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
02707         pol1.FPz += T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
02708     }
02709     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
02710         pol2.FPx += T20_1x()  * pol1.Q20;
02711         pol2.FPx += T21c_1x() * pol1.Q21c;
02712         pol2.FPx += T21s_1x() * pol1.Q21s;
02713         pol2.FPx += T22c_1x() * pol1.Q22c;
02714         pol2.FPx += T22s_1x() * pol1.Q22s;
02715 
02716         pol2.FPy += T20_1y()  * pol1.Q20;
02717         pol2.FPy += T21c_1y() * pol1.Q21c;
02718         pol2.FPy += T21s_1y() * pol1.Q21s;
02719         pol2.FPy += T22c_1y() * pol1.Q22c;
02720         pol2.FPy += T22s_1y() * pol1.Q22s;
02721 
02722         pol2.FPz += T20_1z()  * pol1.Q20;
02723         pol2.FPz += T21c_1z() * pol1.Q21c;
02724         pol2.FPz += T21s_1z() * pol1.Q21s;
02725         pol2.FPz += T22c_1z() * pol1.Q22c;
02726         pol2.FPz += T22s_1z() * pol1.Q22s;        
02727     }
02728 }
02729 
02733 inline double XMP::XInteractor::EnergyIntra(PolarSite &pol1,
02734                                                    PolarSite &pol2) {    
02735 
02736     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
02737     e12  = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
02738     R    = 1/abs(e12);
02739     R2   = R*R;
02740     R3   = R2*R;
02741     R4   = R3*R;
02742     R5   = R4*R;
02743     e12 *= R;
02744     
02745     // Thole damping init.
02746     a    = _xm->_aDamp;
02747     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
02748 
02749 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
02750 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
02751 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
02752 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
02753 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
02754 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
02755 
02756         rax = e12.getX();
02757         ray = e12.getY();
02758         raz = e12.getZ();
02759         rbx = - rax;
02760         rby = - ray;
02761         rbz = - raz;
02762 
02763     if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
02764 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
02765 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
02766 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
02767 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
02768 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
02769 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
02770 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
02771 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
02772 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
02773 
02774         cxx = 1;
02775         cxy = 0;
02776         cxz = 0;
02777         cyx = 0;
02778         cyy = 1;
02779         cyz = 0;
02780         czx = 0;
02781         czy = 0;
02782         czz = 1;
02783     }
02784 
02785     double U = 0.0; // <- Induction energy
02786 
02787     if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
02788         U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
02789         U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
02790         U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
02791 
02792         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02793         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02794         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02795     }
02796     else {
02797         U += pol1.U1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
02798         U += pol1.U1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
02799         U += pol1.U1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
02800 
02801         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02802         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02803         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02804     }
02805 
02806     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
02807         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
02808             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02809             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02810             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02811             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02812             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02813             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02814             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02815             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02816             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02817         }
02818         else {
02819             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02820             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02821             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02822             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02823             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02824             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02825             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02826             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02827             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02828         }
02829     }
02830     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
02831         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
02832             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
02833             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
02834             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
02835             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
02836             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
02837             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
02838             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
02839             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
02840             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
02841         }
02842         else {
02843             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
02844             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
02845             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
02846             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
02847             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
02848             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
02849             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
02850             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
02851             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
02852         }
02853     }
02854 
02855     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
02856         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
02857             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
02858             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
02859             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
02860             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02861             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02862             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02863             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02864             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02865             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02866             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02867             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02868             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02869             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02870             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02871             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02872         }
02873         else {
02874             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
02875             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
02876             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
02877             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02878             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02879             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02880             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02881             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02882             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02883             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02884             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02885             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02886             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02887             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02888             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02889         }
02890     }
02891     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
02892         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
02893             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
02894             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
02895             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
02896             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
02897             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
02898             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
02899             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
02900             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
02901             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
02902             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
02903             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
02904             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
02905             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
02906             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
02907             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
02908         }
02909         else {
02910             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
02911             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
02912             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
02913             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
02914             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
02915             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
02916             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
02917             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
02918             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
02919             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
02920             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
02921             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
02922             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
02923             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
02924             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
02925         }
02926     }
02927     
02928     // Take into account work needed to induce multipoles
02929     U *= 0.5;
02930 
02931     EU_INTRA += U;
02932     return U;
02933 }
02934 
02938 inline double XMP::XInteractor::EnergyInter(PolarSite &pol1,
02939                                                    PolarSite &pol2) {
02940 
02941     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
02942     e12  = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
02943     R    = 1/abs(e12);
02944     R2   = R*R;
02945     R3   = R2*R;
02946     R4   = R3*R;
02947     R5   = R4*R;
02948     e12 *= R;
02949 
02950     // Thole damping init.
02951     a    = _xm->_aDamp;
02952     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
02953 
02954 
02955     //cout << "frag1 " << pol1.getFragment()->getId() << endl;
02956     //cout << "frag2 " << pol2.getFragment()->getId() << endl;
02957     //cout << "seg1  " << pol1.getSegment()->getId() << endl;
02958     //cout << "seg2  " << pol2.getSegment()->getId() << endl;    
02959 
02960     
02961 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
02962 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
02963 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
02964 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
02965 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
02966 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
02967 
02968         rax = e12.getX();
02969         ray = e12.getY();
02970         raz = e12.getZ();
02971         rbx = - rax;
02972         rby = - ray;
02973         rbz = - raz;
02974 
02975     if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
02976 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
02977 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
02978 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
02979 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
02980 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
02981 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
02982 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
02983 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
02984 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
02985 
02986         cxx = 1;
02987         cxy = 0;
02988         cxz = 0;
02989         cyx = 0;
02990         cyy = 1;
02991         cyz = 0;
02992         czx = 0;
02993         czy = 0;
02994         czz = 1;
02995     }
02996 
02997     double E = 0.0; // <- Electrostatic energy
02998     double U = 0.0; // <- Induction energy
02999 
03000         //cout << "r1  " << pol1.getPos() << endl;
03001         //cout << "r2  " << pol2.getPos() << endl;
03002         //cout << "R   " << 1/R << endl;
03003         //cout << "e12 " << e12 << endl;
03004 
03005         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_00() * pol2.Q00;
03006 
03007         //cout << "E up to q <-> q " << E << endl;
03008 
03009     if (a*u3 < 40) {
03010         U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03011         U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03012         U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03013 
03014         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03015         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03016         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03017     }
03018     else {
03019         U += pol1.U1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03020         U += pol1.U1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03021         U += pol1.U1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03022 
03023         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03024         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03025         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03026     }
03027 
03028 
03029 
03030     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
03031         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03032         //cout << "E1x_00 " << pol1.Q1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00 << endl;
03033         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03034         //cout << "E1y_00 " << pol1.Q1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00 << endl;
03035         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03036         //cout << "E1z_00 " << pol1.Q1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00 << endl;
03037     }
03038 
03039     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
03040         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03041         //cout << "E00_1x " << pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.Q1x << endl;
03042         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03043         //cout << "E00_1y " << pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.Q1y << endl;
03044         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03045         //cout << "E00_1z " << pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.Q1z << endl;
03046     }
03047         //cout << "E up to q <-> d " << E << endl;
03048 
03049     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
03050         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_00()  * pol2.Q00;
03051         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_00() * pol2.Q00;
03052         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_00() * pol2.Q00;
03053         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_00() * pol2.Q00;
03054         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_00() * pol2.Q00;
03055     }
03056 
03057     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
03058         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03059         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03060         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03061         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03062         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03063     }
03064         //cout << "E up to q <-> Q " << E << endl;
03065 
03066     if (pol1._rank > 0 && pol2._rank > 0) {
03067         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03068         //cout << "E1x_1x " << pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x << endl;
03069         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03070         //cout << "E1x_1y " << pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y << endl;
03071         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03072         //cout << "E1x_1z " << pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z << endl;
03073 
03074         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03075         //cout << "E1y_1x " << pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x << endl;
03076         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03077         //cout << "E1y_1y " << pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y << endl;
03078         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03079         //cout << "E1y_1z " << pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z << endl;
03080 
03081         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03082         //cout << "E1z_1x " << pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x << endl;
03083         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03084         //cout << "E1z_1y " << pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y << endl;
03085         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03086         //cout << "E1z_1z " << pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z << endl;
03087     }
03088 
03089     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
03090         if (a*u3 < 40) {
03091             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03092             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03093             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03094             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03095             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03096             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03097             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03098             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03099             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03100         }
03101         else {
03102             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03103             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03104             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03105             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03106             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03107             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03108             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03109             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03110             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03111         }
03112     }
03113     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
03114         if (a*u3 < 40) {
03115             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03116             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03117             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03118             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03119             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03120             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03121             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03122             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03123             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03124         }
03125         else {
03126             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03127             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03128             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03129             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03130             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03131             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03132             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03133             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03134             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03135         }
03136     }    
03137         //cout << "E up to d <-> d " << E << endl;
03138 
03139     if (pol1._rank > 1 && pol2._rank > 0) {
03140         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03141         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03142         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03143 
03144         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03145         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03146         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03147 
03148         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03149         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03150         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03151 
03152         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03153         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03154         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03155 
03156         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03157         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03158         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03159     }
03160 
03161     if (pol1._rank > 0 && pol2._rank > 1) {
03162         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_20() * pol2.Q20;
03163         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_20() * pol2.Q20;
03164         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_20() * pol2.Q20;
03165 
03166         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03167         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03168         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03169 
03170         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03171         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03172         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03173 
03174         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03175         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03176         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03177 
03178         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03179         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03180         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03181     }
03182 
03183     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
03184         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03185             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
03186             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
03187             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
03188             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03189             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03190             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03191             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03192             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03193             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03194             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03195             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03196             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03197             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03198             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03199             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03200         }
03201         else {
03202             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
03203             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
03204             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
03205             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03206             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03207             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03208             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03209             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03210             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03211             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03212             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03213             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03214             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03215             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03216             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03217         }
03218     }
03219     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
03220         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03221             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03222             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03223             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03224             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03225             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03226             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03227             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03228             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03229             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03230             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03231             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03232             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03233             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03234             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03235             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03236         }
03237         else {
03238             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03239             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03240             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03241             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03242             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03243             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03244             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03245             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03246             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03247             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03248             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03249             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03250             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03251             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03252             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03253         }
03254     }
03255         //cout << "E up to d <-> Q " << E << endl;
03256 
03257     if (pol1._rank > 1 && pol2._rank > 1) {
03258         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_20()   * pol2.Q20;
03259         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03260         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03261         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03262         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03263 
03264 
03265         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03266         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03267         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03268         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03269         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_20() * pol2.Q20;
03270         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_20() * pol2.Q20;
03271         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_20() * pol2.Q20;
03272         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_20() * pol2.Q20;
03273 
03274 
03275         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03276         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03277         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03278         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03279         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03280         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03281 
03282 
03283         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03284         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03285         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03286         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03287 
03288         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03289         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03290     }
03291         //cout << "E up to Q <-> Q " << E << endl;
03292         
03293 
03294     // Take into account work required to induce multipoles
03295     U *= 0.5;
03296 
03297     EP += E;
03298     EU_INTER += U;
03299     return E + U;
03300 }
03301 
03305 inline double XMP::XInteractor::EnergyInterESP(PolarSite &pol1,
03306                                                       PolarSite &pol2) {
03307     
03308     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
03309     e12  = pol2.getPos() - pol1.getPos();
03310     R    = 1/abs(e12);
03311     R2   = R*R;
03312     R3   = R2*R;
03313     R4   = R3*R;
03314     R5   = R4*R;
03315     e12 *= R;
03316 
03317     // Thole damping init.
03318     a    = _xm->_aDamp;
03319     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
03320 
03321         rax = e12.getX();
03322         ray = e12.getY();
03323         raz = e12.getZ();
03324         rbx = - rax;
03325         rby = - ray;
03326         rbz = - raz;
03327 
03328     if (pol1._rank > 0 || pol2._rank > 0) {
03329 
03330         cxx = 1;
03331         cxy = 0;
03332         cxz = 0;
03333         cyx = 0;
03334         cyy = 1;
03335         cyz = 0;
03336         czx = 0;
03337         czy = 0;
03338         czz = 1;
03339     }
03340 
03341     double E = 0.0; // <- Electrostatic energy
03342     double U = 0.0; // <- Induction energy
03343 
03344         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_00() * pol2.Q00;
03345 
03346     if (a*u3 < 40) {
03347         U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03348         U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03349         U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03350 
03351         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03352         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03353         U += pol1.Q00 * TU00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03354     }
03355     else {
03356         U += pol1.U1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03357         U += pol1.U1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03358         U += pol1.U1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03359 
03360         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03361         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03362         U += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03363     }
03364 
03365 
03366 
03367     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
03368         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_00() * pol2.Q00;
03369         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_00() * pol2.Q00;
03370         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_00() * pol2.Q00;
03371     }
03372 
03373     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
03374         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03375         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03376         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03377     }
03378 
03379     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
03380         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_00()  * pol2.Q00;
03381         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_00() * pol2.Q00;
03382         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_00() * pol2.Q00;
03383         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_00() * pol2.Q00;
03384         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_00() * pol2.Q00;
03385     }
03386 
03387     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
03388         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03389         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03390         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03391         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03392         E += pol1.Q00 * T00_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03393     }
03394 
03395     if (pol1._rank > 0 && pol2._rank > 0) {
03396         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03397         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03398         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03399 
03400         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03401         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03402         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03403 
03404         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03405         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03406         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03407     }
03408 
03409     if (pol1._rank > 0) {
03410         if (a*u3 < 40) {
03411             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03412             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03413             U += pol1.Q1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03414             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03415             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03416             U += pol1.Q1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03417             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03418             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03419             U += pol1.Q1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03420         }
03421         else {
03422             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03423             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03424             U += pol1.Q1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03425             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03426             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03427             U += pol1.Q1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03428             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03429             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03430             U += pol1.Q1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03431         }
03432     }
03433     if (pol2._rank > 0) {
03434         if (a*u3 < 40) {
03435             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03436             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03437             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03438             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03439             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03440             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03441             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03442             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03443             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03444         }
03445         else {
03446             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03447             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03448             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03449             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03450             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03451             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03452             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03453             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03454             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03455         }
03456     }
03457 
03458     if (pol1._rank > 1 && pol2._rank > 0) {
03459         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03460         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03461         E += pol1.Q20 * T20_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03462 
03463         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03464         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03465         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03466 
03467         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03468         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03469         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03470 
03471         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03472         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03473         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03474 
03475         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1x() * pol2.Q1x;
03476         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1y() * pol2.Q1y;
03477         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1z() * pol2.Q1z;
03478     }
03479 
03480     if (pol1._rank > 0 && pol2._rank > 1) {
03481         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_20() * pol2.Q20;
03482         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_20() * pol2.Q20;
03483         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_20() * pol2.Q20;
03484 
03485         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03486         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03487         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03488 
03489         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03490         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03491         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03492 
03493         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03494         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03495         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03496 
03497         E += pol1.Q1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03498         E += pol1.Q1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03499         E += pol1.Q1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03500     }
03501 
03502     if (pol1._rank > 1) {
03503         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03504             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
03505             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
03506             U += pol1.Q20  * TU20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
03507             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03508             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03509             U += pol1.Q21c * TU21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03510             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03511             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03512             U += pol1.Q21s * TU21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03513             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03514             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03515             U += pol1.Q22c * TU22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03516             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03517             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03518             U += pol1.Q22s * TU22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03519         }
03520         else {
03521             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1x()  * pol2.U1x;
03522             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1y()  * pol2.U1y;
03523             U += pol1.Q20  * T20_1z()  * pol2.U1z;
03524             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03525             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03526             U += pol1.Q21c * T21c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03527             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03528             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03529             U += pol1.Q21s * T21s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03530             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03531             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03532             U += pol1.Q22c * T22c_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03533             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1x() * pol2.U1x;
03534             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1y() * pol2.U1y;
03535             U += pol1.Q22s * T22s_1z() * pol2.U1z;
03536         }
03537     }
03538     if (pol2._rank > 1) {
03539         if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
03540             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03541             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03542             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03543             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03544             U += pol1.U1x * TU1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03545             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03546             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03547             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03548             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03549             U += pol1.U1y * TU1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03550             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03551             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03552             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03553             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03554             U += pol1.U1z * TU1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03555         }
03556         else {
03557             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03558             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03559             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03560             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03561             U += pol1.U1x * T1x_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03562             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03563             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03564             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03565             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03566             U += pol1.U1y * T1y_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03567             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_20()  * pol2.Q20;
03568             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03569             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03570             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03571             U += pol1.U1z * T1z_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03572         }
03573     }
03574 
03575     if (pol1._rank > 1 && pol2._rank > 1) {
03576         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_20()   * pol2.Q20;
03577         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03578         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03579         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03580         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03581 
03582 
03583         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03584         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03585         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03586         E += pol1.Q20  * T20_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03587         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_20() * pol2.Q20;
03588         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_20() * pol2.Q20;
03589         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_20() * pol2.Q20;
03590         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_20() * pol2.Q20;
03591 
03592 
03593         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03594         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03595         E += pol1.Q21c * T21c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03596         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03597         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03598         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21c() * pol2.Q21c;
03599 
03600 
03601         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03602         E += pol1.Q21s * T21s_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03603         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03604         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_21s() * pol2.Q21s;
03605 
03606         E += pol1.Q22s * T22s_22c() * pol2.Q22c;
03607         E += pol1.Q22c * T22c_22s() * pol2.Q22s;
03608     }
03609 
03610     // Take into account work required to induce multipoles
03611     U *= 0.5;
03612 
03613     return E + U;
03614 }
